atk-vin02a2:7_0: Yaṃ tassa dāni sampatto, yasmā saṃvaṇṇanākkamo;
atk-vin02a2:10_0: Te ce puna vadeyyāma, pariyosānaṃ kadā bhave.
atk-vin02a2:11_0: Uttānā ceva ye atthā, tesaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāya kiṃ;
atk-vin02a2:13_0: Anuttānā na te yasmā, sakkā ñātuṃ avaṇṇitā;
atk-vin02a2:15_1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddhoti
atk-vin02a2:15_2: ettha kiñcāpi “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāya”ntiādīsu viya karaṇavacane visesakāraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-vin02a2:15_3: vinayaṃ patvā pana karaṇavacaneneva ayamabhilāpo āropitoti ādito paṭṭhāya āruḷhābhilāpavasenevetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:15_4: Esa nayo aññesupi ito paresu evarūpesu.
atk-vin02a2:16_4: imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjaṃ upasampada”nti evaṃ pabbajjā ceva upasampadā ca anuññātā,
atk-vin02a2:16_6: tāni abhisambodhiṃ patvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe vītināmetvā bārāṇasiyaṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā iminā
atk-vin02a2:16_7: anukkamena idañcidañca ṭhānaṃ patvā imasmiñca imasmiñca vatthusmiṃ paññattānīti evametesaṃ pabbajjādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a2:16_8: vinayakammānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya nidānadassanaṃ etassa vacane payojananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:17_4: velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a2:17_5: Atīte kira anuppanne buddhe dasasahassakulaputtā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tasmiṃ padese viharantā ekadivasaṃ sannipatitvā katikavattaṃ akaṃsu –
atk-vin02a2:17_8: tasmā yo kāmavitakkaṃ vā byāpādavitakkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā vitakketi,
atk-vin02a2:17_10: so attanāva attānaṃ codetvā pattapuṭena vālikaṃ āharitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ākiratu,
atk-vin02a2:17_12: Tato paṭṭhāya yo tādisaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketi,
atk-vin02a2:17_15: tato naṃ pacchimā janatā parikkhipitvā cetiyaṭṭhānamakāsi.
atk-vin02a2:17_22: velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
atk-vin02a2:18_0: Bodhirukkhamūleti bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ;
atk-vin02a2:18_1: taṃ bodhiṃ bhagavā ettha pattoti rukkhopi “bodhirukkho”tveva nāmaṃ labhi,
atk-vin02a2:18_5: Ekapallaṅkenāti sakimpi anuṭṭhahitvā yathāābhujitena ekeneva pallaṅkena.
atk-vin02a2:19_1: Paccayākāro hi aññamaññaṃ paṭicca sahite dhamme uppādetīti “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti vuccati.
atk-vin02a2:19_3: Vitthāro pana sabbākārasampannaṃ vinicchayaṃ icchantena visuddhimaggato gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:19_5: Tattha “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena vutto avijjādiko paccayākāro attanā kattabbakiccakaraṇato “anulomo”ti vuccati.
atk-vin02a2:19_6: “Avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”tiādinā nayena vutto sveva anuppādanirodhena nirujjhamāno
atk-vin02a2:19_7: taṃ kiccaṃ na karotīti tassa akaraṇato “paṭilomo”ti vuccati.
atk-vin02a2:19_9: itaro tassā paṭilomoti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a2:19_11: antato ca paṭṭhāya yāva ādiṃ pāpetvā avuttattā ito aññenatthena anulomapaṭilomatā na yujjati.
atk-vin02a2:20_3: Tattha avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo.
atk-vin02a2:20_4: Tasmā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantīti iminā nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a2:20_6: Vitthāro pana sabbākārasampannaṃ vinicchayaṃ icchantena visuddhimaggatova gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:21_1: idaṃ dassetuṃ avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodhotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:21_2: Tattha avijjāya tvevāti avijjāya tu eva.
atk-vin02a2:21_5: Evaṃ niruddhānaṃ pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā viññāṇaṃ niruddhaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:21_6: viññāṇādīnañca nirodhā nāmarūpādīni niruddhāniyeva hontīti dassetuṃ saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodhotiādīni
atk-vin02a2:21_7: vatvā evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:22_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yvāyaṃ “avijjādivasena saṅkhārādikassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo ca avijjānirodhādivasena ca nirodho hotī”ti vutto,
atk-vin02a2:22_2: Tāyaṃ velāyanti tāyaṃ tassa atthassa viditavelāyaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:22_3: Imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti imaṃ tasmiṃ vidite atthe hetuno ca hetusamuppannadhammassa ca pajānanāya ānubhāvadīpakaṃ
atk-vin02a2:23_9: Jhāyatoti ārammaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇena ca lakkhaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇena ca jhānena jhāyantassa.
atk-vin02a2:23_11: Athassa kaṅkhā vapayantīti athassa evaṃ pātubhūtadhammassa kaṅkhā vapayanti.
atk-vin02a2:23_12: Sabbāti yā etā “ko nu kho bhante phusatīti;
atk-vin02a2:23_16: no kallo pañhoti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā ca nayena paccayākāre kaṅkhā vuttā,
atk-vin02a2:23_17: yā ca paccayākārasseva appaṭividdhattā “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādikā soḷasa kaṅkhā āgatā,
atk-vin02a2:23_18: tā sabbā vapayanti apagacchanti nirujjhanti. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a2:23_19: Yato pajānāti sahetudhammanti yasmā avijjādikena hetunā sahetukaṃ imaṃ saṅkhārādiṃ kevalaṃ dukkhakkhandhadhammaṃ pajānāti aññāti paṭivijjhatīti.
atk-vin02a2:24_2: imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti imaṃ tasmiṃ vidite atthe “avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”ti
atk-vin02a2:24_3: evaṃ pakāsitassa nibbānasaṅkhātassa paccayakkhayassa avabodhānubhāvadīpakaṃ vuttappakāraṃ udānaṃ udānesīti attho.
atk-vin02a2:24_5: yasmā paccayānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi,
atk-vin02a2:24_6: tasmā yadāssa ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa vuttappakārā dhammā pātubhavanti,
atk-vin02a2:25_2: imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti imaṃ yena maggena so dukkhakkhandhassa samudayanirodhasaṅkhāto attho kiccavasena ca ārammaṇakiriyāya ca vidito,
atk-vin02a2:25_3: tassa ariyamaggassa ānubhāvadīpakaṃ vuttappakāraṃ udānaṃ udānesīti attho.
atk-vin02a2:25_5: yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa,
atk-vin02a2:25_6: tadā so brāhmaṇo tehi vā uppannehi bodhipakkhiyadhammehi,
atk-vin02a2:25_8: tena ariyamaggena vidhūpayaṃ tiṭṭhati mārasenaṃ “kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādinā nayena vuttappakāraṃ mārasenaṃ
atk-vin02a2:25_11: yathā sūriyo abbhuggato attano pabhāya antalikkhaṃ obhāsentova andhakāraṃ vidhamento tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a2:25_12: evaṃ sopi brāhmaṇo tehi dhammehi tena vā maggena saccāni paṭivijjhantova mārasenaṃ vidhūpayanto tiṭṭhatīti.
atk-vin02a2:26_3: Udāne pana “rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:26_6: taṃ sattāhassa accayena “sve āsanā vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti rattiṃ uppāditamanasikāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:26_7: Tadā hi bhagavā yassa paccayākārapajānanassa ca paccayakkhayādhigamassa ca ānubhāvadīpikā purimā dve udānagāthā,
atk-vin02a2:26_8: tassa vasena ekekameva koṭṭhāsaṃ paṭhamayāmañca majjhimayāmañca manasākāsi,
atk-vin02a2:26_10: Bhagavā hi visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussari,
atk-vin02a2:26_12: pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasi katvā “idāni aruṇo uggamissatī”ti sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-vin02a2:26_14: Tato taṃ divasaṃ teneva pallaṅkena vītināmetvā sampattāya pāṭipadarattiyā tīsu yāmesu evaṃ manasi katvā imāni udānāni udānesi.
atk-vin02a2:26_15: Iti pāṭipadarattiyā evaṃ manasi katvā taṃ “bodhirukkhamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdī”ti evaṃ vuttasattāhaṃ tattheva vītināmesi.
atk-vin02a2:29_1: Atha kho bhagavā sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho
atk-vin02a2:29_2: tenupasaṅkamīti ettha na bhagavā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā anantarameva bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho
atk-vin02a2:29_4: Yathā pana “bhutvā sayatī”ti vutte na “hatthe adhovitvā mukhaṃ avikkhāletvā sayanasamīpaṃ agantvā aññaṃ
atk-vin02a2:29_5: kiñci ālāpasallāpaṃ akatvā sayati”cceva vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a2:29_8: Evamidhāpi “na tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā anantarameva pakkāmī”ti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a2:30_0: Anantaraṃ pana apakkamitvā bhagavā kiṃ akāsīti?
atk-vin02a2:30_3: bhagavati kira buddhattaṃ patvā sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinne “na bhagavā vuṭṭhāti;
atk-vin02a2:30_4: kiṃ nu kho aññepi buddhattakarā dhammā atthī”ti ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ kaṅkhā udapādi.
atk-vin02a2:30_5: Atha bhagavā aṭṭhame divase samāpattito vuṭṭhāya devatānaṃ kaṅkhaṃ ñatvā kaṅkhāvidhamanatthaṃ ākāse uppatitvā
atk-vin02a2:30_6: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā tāsaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vidhamitvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite uttaradisābhāge ṭhatvā
atk-vin02a2:30_7: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca upacitānaṃ pāramīnaṃ balādhigamanaṭṭhānaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bodhirukkhañca
atk-vin02a2:30_10: Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antarā puratthimato ca pacchimato ca āyate ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-vin02a2:30_13: Tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ visesato cettha anantanayaṃ samantapaṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-vin02a2:31_0: Evaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni vītināmetvā pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami.
atk-vin02a2:31_1: Tassa kira nigrodhassa chāyāya ajapālakā gantvā nisīdanti;
atk-vin02a2:31_3: Sattāhaṃ vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedīti tatrāpi dhammaṃ vicinantoyeva vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi.
atk-vin02a2:31_5: Evaṃ nisinne ca panettha bhagavati eko brāhmaṇo gantvā pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-vin02a2:31_7: Tattha huṃhuṅkajātikoti so kira diṭṭhamaṅgaliko nāma,
atk-vin02a2:32_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tena vuttassa vacanassa sikhāpattamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-vin02a2:32_3: huṃhuṅkārakabhāvādipāpadhammayutto hutvā kevalaṃ jātimattakena brahmaññaṃ paṭijānāti,
atk-vin02a2:32_14: yassa sakale lokasannivāse kuhiñci ekārammaṇepi rāgussado dosussado mohussado mānussado diṭṭhussadoti ime ussadā natthīti.
atk-vin02a2:35_2: Ayaṃ pana gimhānaṃ pacchime māse udapādi.
atk-vin02a2:35_3: Sattāhavaddalikāti tasmiṃ uppanne sattāhaṃ avicchinnavuṭṭhikā ahosi.
atk-vin02a2:35_4: Sītavātaduddinīti sā ca pana sattāhavaddalikā udakaphusitasammissena sītavātena samantā paribbhamantena dūsitadivasattā sītavātaduddinī nāma ahosi.
atk-vin02a2:35_5: Atha kho mucalindo nāgarājāti tasseva mucalindarukkhassa samīpe pokkharaṇiyā nibbatto mahānubhāvo nāgarājā.
atk-vin02a2:35_6: Sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvāti evaṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā uparimuddhani mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ karitvāva ṭhite;
atk-vin02a2:35_7: tasmiṃ tassa parikkhepabbhantaraṃ lohapāsāde bhaṇḍāgāragabbhappamāṇaṃ ahosi,
atk-vin02a2:35_8: tasmā bhagavā nivāte pihitadvāravātapāne kūṭāgāre nisinno viya jāto.
atk-vin02a2:35_9: Mā bhagavantaṃ sītantiādi tassa tathā karitvā ṭhānakāraṇaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:35_10: So hi “mā bhagavantaṃ sītaṃ bādhayittha, mā uṇhaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:35_11: mā ḍaṃsādisamphasso bādhayitthā”ti tathā karitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin02a2:35_13: sace pana antarantarā megho vigaccheyya uṇhaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-vin02a2:35_14: tampi naṃ mā bādhayitthāti evaṃ tassa cintetuṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:36_3: Passatoti taṃ vivekaṃ yaṃ vā kiñci passitabbaṃ nāma,
atk-vin02a2:36_4: taṃ sabbaṃ attano vīriyabalādhigatena ñāṇacakkhunā passantassa.
atk-vin02a2:36_10: Sukhā virāgatā loketi vītarāgatāpi sukhāti dīpeti.
atk-vin02a2:36_14: Asmimānassa yo vinayoti iminā pana arahattaṃ kathitaṃ;
atk-vin02a2:39_3: Tena kho pana samayenāti katarena samayena.
atk-vin02a2:39_4: Bhagavato kira rājāyatanamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa samādhito vuṭṭhānadivase aruṇuggamanavelāyameva
atk-vin02a2:39_5: “bhojanakiccena bhavitabba”nti ñatvā sakko devarājā osadhaharītakaṃ upanesi.
atk-vin02a2:39_9: Bhagavā mukhaṃ dhovitvā tasmiṃyeva rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-vin02a2:40_0: Tena kho pana samayena tapussabhallikā vāṇijāti tapusso ca bhalliko cāti dve bhātaro vāṇijā.
atk-vin02a2:40_2: Taṃ desanti yasmiṃ dese bhagavā viharati.
atk-vin02a2:40_5: Tasmā majjhimadesaṃ gantuṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā hontīti ayamettha attho.
atk-vin02a2:40_7: Etadavocāti sā kira nesaṃ sabbasakaṭāni appavattīni akāsi.
atk-vin02a2:40_8: Tato te kiṃ idanti maggadevatānaṃ baliṃ akaṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:40_9: Tesaṃ balikammakāle sā devatā dissamāneneva kāyena etaṃ avoca.
atk-vin02a2:40_10: Manthena ca madhupiṇḍikāya cāti abaddhasattunā ca sappimadhuphāṇitādīhi yojetvā baddhasattunā ca.
atk-vin02a2:40_12: Taṃ voti taṃ patimānanaṃ tumhākaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya.
atk-vin02a2:40_13: Yaṃ amhākanti yaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ amhākaṃ assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya.
atk-vin02a2:40_14: Bhagavato etadahosīti yo kirassa padhānānuyogakāle patto ahosi,
atk-vin02a2:40_15: so sujātāya pāyāsaṃ dātuṃ āgacchantiyā eva antaradhāyi.
atk-vin02a2:40_18: purimakāpi ca na kho tathāgatā hatthesu paṭiggaṇhanti,
atk-vin02a2:40_19: kimhi nu kho ahaṃ paṭiggaṇheyyaṃ manthañca madhupiṇḍakañcā”ti.
atk-vin02a2:41_0: Parivitakkamaññāyāti ito pubbeva bhagavato sujātāya dinnabhojanaṃyeva ojānuppabandhanavasena aṭṭhāsi,
atk-vin02a2:41_1: ettakaṃ kālaṃ neva jighacchā na pipāsā na kāyadubbalyaṃ ahosi.
atk-vin02a2:41_2: Idāni panassa āhāraṃ paṭiggahetukāmatāya “na kho tathāgatā”tiādinā nayena parivitakko udapādi.
atk-vin02a2:41_3: Taṃ evaṃ uppannaṃ attano cetasā bhagavato cetoparivitakkamaññāya.
atk-vin02a2:41_8: Cattāro pana mahārājāno paṭhamaṃ indanīlamaṇimaye patte upanāmesuṃ,
atk-vin02a2:41_10: Tato ime cattāropi muggavaṇṇasilāmaye patte upanāmesuṃ,
atk-vin02a2:41_11: bhagavā cattāropi patte aggahesi tesaṃ pasādānurakkhaṇatthāya,
atk-vin02a2:41_13: Gahetvā ca pana cattāropi yathā ekova patto hoti tathā adhiṭṭhahi,
atk-vin02a2:41_15: Evaṃ ekaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhite paṭiggahesi bhagavā paccagghe selamaye patte manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca.
atk-vin02a2:41_21: Atha vā dvīhi vācāhi upāsakabhāvaṃ pattāti attho.
atk-vin02a2:41_22: Te evaṃ upāsakabhāvaṃ paṭivedetvā bhagavantaṃ āhaṃsu –
atk-vin02a2:41_23: “kassa dāni bhante amhehi ajja paṭṭhāya abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānaṃ kātabba”nti?
atk-vin02a2:41_27: Te kesadhātuyo labhitvā amateneva abhisittā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:44_1: Atha kho bhagavā sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā vuttappakārametaṃ sabbaṃ kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā
atk-vin02a2:44_3: Parivitakko udapādīti tasmiṃ nisinnamattasseva sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo ayaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi.
atk-vin02a2:44_5: Dhammassa mahantabhāvaṃ garubhāvaṃ bhāriyabhāvaṃ paccavekkhaṇāya brahmunā yācite desetukāmatāya ca.
atk-vin02a2:44_6: Jānanti hi buddhā “evaṃ parivitakkite brahmā āgantvā dhammadesanaṃ yācissati,
atk-vin02a2:44_9: Iti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ vitakko uppajjatīti.
atk-vin02a2:45_0: Tattha adhigato kho myāyanti adhigato kho me ayaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:45_7: Tassa ṭhānaṃ sandhāya “yaṃ ida”nti paṭiccasamuppādaṃ sandhāya “yo aya”nti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a2:45_10: idappaccayatā ca sā paṭiccasamuppādo cāti idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo.
atk-vin02a2:45_11: So mamassa kilamathoti yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma,
atk-vin02a2:46_3: Alaṃ dāni me imaṃ kicchena adhigataṃ dhammaṃ desetunti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a2:47_1: Yatra hi nāmāti yasmiṃ nāma loke.
atk-vin02a2:47_2: Bhagavato purato pāturahosīti dhammadesanāyācanatthaṃ dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu mahābrahmāno gahetvā āgamma bhagavato purato pāturahosi.
atk-vin02a2:47_3: Apparajakkhajātikāti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesaṃ evaṃsabhāvāti apparajakkhajātikā.
atk-vin02a2:48_1: Samalehi cintitoti rāgādīhi malehi samalehi chahi satthārehi cintito.
atk-vin02a2:48_3: Amatassa dvāranti amatassa nibbānassa dvārabhūtaṃ ariyamaggaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:48_4: Suṇantu dhammaṃ vimalenānubuddhanti ime sattā rāgādimalānaṃ abhāvato vimalena sammāsambuddhena anubuddhaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ suṇantu.
atk-vin02a2:49_0: Sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhitoti selamaye ekagghane pabbatamuddhani yathāṭhitova yathā cakkhumā puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya,
atk-vin02a2:49_1: tvampi sumedha sundarapañña sabbaññutaññāṇena samantacakkhu bhagavā dhammamayaṃ paññāmayaṃ pāsādamāruyha
atk-vin02a2:49_2: sayaṃ apetasoko sokāvatiṇṇaṃ jātijarābhibhūtañca janataṃ avekkhassu upadhāraya.
atk-vin02a2:50_0: Uṭṭhehīti bhagavato dhammadesanatthaṃ cārikacaraṇaṃ yācanto bhaṇati.
atk-vin02a2:51_7: Yesaṃ saddhādīni indriyāni tikkhāni te tikkhindriyā.
atk-vin02a2:51_9: Yesaṃ teyeva saddhādayo ākārā sundarā te svākārā.
atk-vin02a2:51_10: Yesaṃ teyeva saddhādayo ākārā asundarā te dvākārā.
atk-vin02a2:51_12: sukhena sakkā honti viññāpetuṃ te suviññāpayā.
atk-vin02a2:51_13: Ye paralokañca vajjañca bhayato passanti te paralokavajjabhayadassāvino.
atk-vin02a2:51_16: Antonimuggaposīnīti yāni udakassa anto nimuggāneva posayanti.
atk-vin02a2:51_18: Udakaṃ accuggamma ṭhitānīti udakaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitāni.
atk-vin02a2:52_3: Pamuñcantu saddhanti sabbe attano saddhaṃ pamuñcantu.
atk-vin02a2:52_5: ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattimpi imaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ dhammaṃ kāyavācākilamathasaññī hutvā manujesu devamanussesu na bhāsinti.
atk-vin02a2:55_6: Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ uppajji “ito sattamadivasamatthake kālaṃkatvā ākiñcaññāyatane nibbatto”ti.
atk-vin02a2:55_7: Mahājāniyoti sattadivasabbhantare pattabbamaggaphalato parihīnattā mahatī jāni assāti mahājāniyo akkhaṇe nibbattattā.
atk-vin02a2:55_11: Padhānapahitattaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsūti padhānatthāya pesitattabhāvaṃ mukhodakadānādinā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:56_1: Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhinti upako bodhimaṇḍassa ca gayāya ca antare bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-vin02a2:57_2: Sabbesu dhammesu anūpalittoti sabbesu tebhūmakadhammesu kilesalepena alitto.
atk-vin02a2:57_4: Taṇhakkhaye vimuttoti taṇhakkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto.
atk-vin02a2:57_5: Sayaṃ abhiññāyāti sabbaṃ catubhūmakadhammaṃ attanāva jānitvā.
atk-vin02a2:57_6: Kamuddiseyyanti kaṃ aññaṃ “ayaṃ me ācariyo”ti uddiseyyaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:58_0: Na me ācariyo atthīti lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo nāma natthi.
atk-vin02a2:58_1: Natthi me paṭipuggaloti mayhaṃ paṭibhāgapuggalo nāma natthi.
atk-vin02a2:59_1: Āhañchaṃ amatadundubhinti dhammacakkappaṭilābhāya amatabheriṃ paharissāmīti gacchāmi.
atk-vin02a2:61_5: Odahatha bhikkhave sotanti upanetha bhikkhave sotaṃ;
atk-vin02a2:61_7: Amatamadhigatanti amataṃ nibbānaṃ mayā adhigatanti dasseti.
atk-vin02a2:61_10: Abhijānātha me noti abhijānātha nu me samanupassatha.
atk-vin02a2:61_11: Evarūpaṃ bhāsitametanti etaṃ evarūpaṃ vākyaṃ bhāsitanti attho.
atk-vin02a2:61_12: Asakkhi kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū saññāpetunti “ahaṃ buddho”ti jānāpetuṃ asakkhi.
atk-vin02a2:62_3: Adhippāyānusandhiyojanādibhedato pana papañcasūdaniyā majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:62_4: Ito paṭṭhāya hi ativitthārabhīrukassa mahājanassa cittaṃ anurakkhantā suttantakathaṃ avaṇṇayitvā vinayakathaṃyeva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-vin02a2:63_1: Sāva tassa āyasmato upasampadā ahosīti āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāya aṭṭhārasahi devatākoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale
atk-vin02a2:63_2: patiṭṭhitassa “ehi bhikkhū”ti bhagavato vacanena abhinipphannā sāva tassa āyasmato ehibhikkhūpasampadā ahosi.
atk-vin02a2:64_1: Atha kho āyasmato ca vappassāti ādimhi vappattherassa pāṭipadadivase dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi,
atk-vin02a2:64_5: Imesañca pana bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṭṭhānesu uppannamalavisodhanatthaṃ bhagavā antovihāreyeva ahosi.
atk-vin02a2:64_6: Uppanne uppanne kammaṭṭhānamale ākāsena gantvā malaṃ vinodesi.
atk-vin02a2:64_7: Pakkhassa pana pañcamiyaṃ sabbe te ekato sannipātetvā anattasuttena ovadi.
atk-vin02a2:65_1: Tena kho pana samayena cha loke arahanto hontīti pañcamiyā pakkhassa lokasmiṃ cha manussā arahanto hontīti attho.
atk-vin02a2:68_2: Tena kho pana samayena ekasaṭṭhi loke arahanto hontīti purimā cha ime ca pañcapaññāsāti antovassamhiyeva ekasaṭṭhi manussā arahanto hontīti attho.
atk-vin02a2:69_1: atīte kira pañcapaññāsajanā sahāyakā vaggabandhena puññāni karontā anāthasarīrāni paṭijaggantā vicaranti,
atk-vin02a2:69_2: te ekadivasaṃ gabbhiniṃ itthiṃ kālaṃkataṃ disvā “jhāpessāmā”ti susānaṃ nīhariṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:69_3: Tesu pañca jane “tumhe jhāpethā”ti susāne ṭhapetvā sesā gāmaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-vin02a2:69_4: Yaso dārako taṃ sarīraṃ vijjhitvā parivattetvā ca jhāpayamāno asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-vin02a2:69_5: So itaresampi catunnaṃ janānaṃ “passatha bho imaṃ asuciṃ paṭikūla”nti dassesi.
atk-vin02a2:69_7: Te pañcapi janā gāmaṃ gantvā sesasahāyakānaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:69_8: Yaso pana dārako gehampi gantvā mātāpitūnnañca bhariyāya ca kathesi.
atk-vin02a2:69_12: tāyeva ca upanissayasampattiyā sabbesaṃ visesādhigamo nibbattīti.
atk-vin02a2:70_0: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesīti bhagavā yāva pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā,
atk-vin02a2:70_1: tāva bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanto ekadivasaṃ te khīṇāsave saṭṭhi bhikkhū āmantesi.
atk-vin02a2:71_3: Mā ekena dveti ekena maggena dve mā agamittha.
atk-vin02a2:73_1: Nānādisā nānājanapadāti nānādisato ca nānājanapadato ca.
atk-vin02a2:73_2: Anujānāmi bhikkhave tumheva dāni tāsu tāsu disāsu tesu tesu janapadesu pabbājethātiādimhi pabbajjāpekkhaṃ
atk-vin02a2:73_3: kulaputtaṃ pabbājentena ye parato “na bhikkhave pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭho pabbājetabbo”tiādiṃ katvā yāva
atk-vin02a2:73_7: Tassa anujānanalakkhaṇaṃ “na bhikkhave ananuññāto mātāpitūhi putto pabbājetabbo,
atk-vin02a2:74_0: Evaṃ pabbajjādosavirahitaṃ mātāpitūhi anuññātaṃ pabbājentenāpi ca sace acchinnakeso hoti,
atk-vin02a2:74_11: Avuttopi ce daharabhikkhu upajjhāyaṃ uddissa pabbājeti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:74_13: sāmaṇeropi vattabbo “etaṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ netvā pabbājetvā kāsāyāni acchādetvā ehī”ti.
atk-vin02a2:74_16: Purisañhi bhikkhuto añño pabbājetuṃ na labhati,
atk-vin02a2:74_18: Sāmaṇero pana sāmaṇerī vā āṇattiyā kāsāyāni dātuṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a2:75_0: Sace pana bhabbarūpo hoti sahetuko ñāto yasassī kulaputto,
atk-vin02a2:75_2: “Mattikāmuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā nhāyitvā kese temetvā āgacchāhī”ti ca pana na vissajjetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:75_4: pacchā pana kāsāyāni ca kesaharaṇasatthakañca disvā utrasanti,
atk-vin02a2:75_6: tasmā sayameva nahānatitthaṃ netvā sace nātidaharo hoti,
atk-vin02a2:75_8: Kesā panassa sayameva mattikaṃ gahetvā dhovitabbā.
atk-vin02a2:75_9: Daharakumārako pana sayaṃ udakaṃ otaritvā gomayamattikāhi ghaṃsitvā nahāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:75_10: Sacepissa kacchu vā piḷakā vā honti,
atk-vin02a2:75_12: evameva ajigucchantena sādhukaṃ hatthapādasīsāni ghaṃsitvā nahāpetabbo. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a2:75_13: Ettakena hi upakārena kulaputtā ācariyupajjhāyesu ca sāsane ca balavasinehā tibbagāravā anivattidhammā honti,
atk-vin02a2:76_0: Evaṃ nahāpanakāle pana kesamassuṃ oropanakāle vā “tvaṃ ñāto yasassī,
atk-vin02a2:76_1: idāni mayaṃ taṃ nissāya paccayehi na kilamissāmā”ti na vattabbo,
atk-vin02a2:76_4: suṭṭhu upadhārehi satiṃ upaṭṭhāpehī”ti vatvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:76_5: ācikkhantena ca vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena asucijegucchapaṭikūlabhāvaṃ nijjīvanissattabhāvaṃ vā pākaṭaṃ karontena ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:76_6: Sace hi so pubbe madditasaṅkhāro hoti bhāvitabhāvano,
atk-vin02a2:76_9: athassa āraddhamatte kammaṭṭhānamanasikāre indāsani viya pabbate kilesapabbate cuṇṇayamānaṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
atk-vin02a2:76_11: Ye hi keci khuragge arahattaṃ pattā,
atk-vin02a2:76_12: sabbe te evarūpaṃ savanaṃ labhitvā kalyāṇamittena ācariyena dinnanayaṃ nissāya no anissāya.
atk-vin02a2:77_0: Kesesu pana oropitesu haliddicuṇṇena vā gandhacuṇṇena vā sīsañca sarīrañca ubbaṭṭetvā gihigandhaṃ apanetvā
atk-vin02a2:77_1: kāsāyāni tikkhattuṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā sakiṃ vā paṭiggāhetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:77_2: Athāpissa hatthe adatvā ācariyo vā upajjhāyo vā sayameva acchādeti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:77_3: Sacepi aññaṃ daharaṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā āṇāpeti “āvuso,
atk-vin02a2:77_4: etāni kāsāyāni gahetvā etaṃ acchādehī”ti taṃyeva vā āṇāpeti “etāni gahetvā acchādehī”ti sabbaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:78_0: Yaṃ pana nivāsanaṃ vā pārupanaṃ vā anāṇattiyā nivāseti vā pārupati vā,
atk-vin02a2:78_2: Bhikkhunā hi sahatthena vā āṇattiyā vā dinnameva kāsāvaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a2:78_5: ko pana vādo upajjhāyamūlake! Ayaṃ “paṭhamaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādāpetvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā”ti ettha vinicchayo.
atk-vin02a2:79_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvāti ye tattha sannipatitā bhikkhū,
atk-vin02a2:79_2: atha saraṇaggahaṇatthaṃ ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā evaṃ vadehīti vattabbo.
atk-vin02a2:79_5: Athassa upajjhāyena vā ācariyena vā “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”tiādinā nayena saraṇāni dātabbāni yathāvuttapaṭipāṭiyāva na uppaṭipāṭiyā.
atk-vin02a2:79_6: Sace hi ekapadampi ekakkharampi uppaṭipāṭiyā deti,
atk-vin02a2:79_7: buddhaṃ saraṇaṃyeva vā tikkhattuṃ datvā puna itaresu ekekaṃ tikkhattuṃ deti,
atk-vin02a2:80_0: Imañca pana saraṇagamanūpasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā anuññātaupasampadā ekato suddhiyā vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:80_3: Tasmā upasampadāya sace ācariyo ñattidosañceva kammavācādosañca vajjetvā kammaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a2:80_5: Pabbajjāya pana imāni tīṇi saraṇāni bukāradhakārādīnaṃ byañjanānaṃ ṭhānakaraṇasampadaṃ ahāpenteneva ācariyenapi antevāsikenapi vattabbāni.
atk-vin02a2:81_0: Imāni ca pana dadamānena “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti evaṃ ekasambandhāni anunāsikantāni vā katvā dātabbāni,
atk-vin02a2:81_1: “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti evaṃ vicchinditvā makārantāni vā katvā dātabbāni.
atk-vin02a2:81_2: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ nāmaṃ sāvetvā “ahaṃ bhante buddharakkhito yāvajīvaṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:81_7: Na hi tathā avadantassa saraṇaṃ kuppatīti.
atk-vin02a2:82_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjaṃ upasampadanti imehi buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmītiādīhi
atk-vin02a2:82_1: evaṃ tikkhattuṃ ubhatosuddhiyā vuttehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjañceva upasampadañca anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a2:82_3: tasmā sā etarahi saraṇamatteneva na ruhati.
atk-vin02a2:82_6: imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi sāmaṇerapabbajja”nti anuññātā eva,
atk-vin02a2:83_1: athassa tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne sikkhāpadāni uddisitabbāni. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin02a2:85_0: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ahaṃ, bhante, itthannāmo yāvajīvaṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ
atk-vin02a2:86_0: Samādiyāmī”ti evaṃ saraṇadānaṃ viya sikkhāpadadānampi vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:86_1: taṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāsu atthi,
atk-vin02a2:86_5: Tasmā tāni pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena uggahetuṃ asakkontassa yāya kāyaci bhāsāya atthavasenapi ācikkhituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:86_6: Yāva pana attanā sikkhitabbasikkhāpadāni na jānāti,
atk-vin02a2:86_8: tāva bhojanasālaṃ vā salākabhājanaṭṭhānaṃ vā aññaṃ vā tathārūpaṭṭhānaṃ na pesetabbo,
atk-vin02a2:86_15: dasahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ sāmaṇeraṃ nāsetu”nti evaṃ parato vuttāni dasa nāsanaṅgāni ārakā parivajjetvā
atk-vin02a2:86_16: ābhisamācārikaṃ paripūrentena dasavidhe sīle sādhukaṃ sikkhitabbanti.
atk-vin02a2:89_1: Mayhaṃ kho bhikkhaveti mayā khoti attho.
atk-vin02a2:89_2: Atha vā yo mayhaṃ yoniso manasikāro,
atk-vin02a2:89_4: Puna anuppattāti ettha vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā mayāti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:92_1: Bhaddavaggiyāti te kira rājakumārā rūpena ca cittena ca bhaddakā vaggabandhena ca vicaranti,
atk-vin02a2:92_3: Tena hi voti ettha vokāro nipātamatto.
atk-vin02a2:96_2: Tejasā tejanti attano tejena nāgassa tejaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:96_6: Natveva ca kho arahā yathā ahanti attānaṃ “arahā aha”nti maññamāno vadati.
atk-vin02a2:98_2: “Bhante āhara hattha”nti evaṃ vadanto viya oṇatoti āharahattho.
atk-vin02a2:100_0: 52. Kesamissantiādīsu kesā eva kesamissaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha. Khārikājanti khāribhāro.
atk-vin02a2:104_0: Kisakovadānoti tāpasacariyāya kisasarīrattā “kisako”ti laddhanāmānaṃ tāpasānaṃ ovādako anusāsako samānoti attho.
atk-vin02a2:104_1: Atha vā sayaṃ kisako tāpaso samāno vadāno ca aññe ovadanto anusāsantotipi attho.
atk-vin02a2:104_4: “tvaṃ uruvelavāsiaggiparicārakānaṃ tāpasānaṃ sayaṃ ovādācariyo samāno kiṃ disvā pahāsi,
atk-vin02a2:104_5: pucchāmi taṃ etamatthaṃ kena kāraṇena tava aggihuttaṃ pahīna”nti.
atk-vin02a2:105_1: ete rūpādike kāme itthiyo ca yaññā abhivadanti,
atk-vin02a2:105_2: svāhaṃ etaṃ sabbampi rūpādikaṃ kāmappabhedaṃ khandhupadhīsu malanti ñatvā yasmā ime yiṭṭhahutappabhedā yaññā malameva vadanti,
atk-vin02a2:105_3: tasmā na yiṭṭhe na hute arañjiṃ;
atk-vin02a2:105_4: yiṭṭhe vā hute vā nābhiraminti attho.
atk-vin02a2:106_0: Tatiyagāthāya – atha kocarahīti atha kvacarahi. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a2:107_5: Tīsu bhavesu alaggatāya yaṃ kāmabhavaṃ yaññā vadanti,
atk-vin02a2:107_11: tasmā na yiṭṭhe na hute arañjiṃ.
atk-vin02a2:107_13: Yo ahaṃ devamanussalokasampattisādhake na yiṭṭhe na hute arañjiṃ,
atk-vin02a2:107_14: so kiṃ vakkhāmi “ettha nāma me devamanussaloke rato mano”ti.
atk-vin02a2:108_1: Evaṃ sabbaloke anabhiratibhāvaṃ pakāsetvā atha kho āyasmā uruvelakassapo “sāvakohamasmī”ti evaṃ bhagavato sāvakabhāvaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-vin02a2:108_2: Tañca kho ākāse vividhāni pāṭihāriyāni dassetvā.
atk-vin02a2:109_3: Esāhaṃ bhanteti ettha pana kiñcāpi maggappaṭivedhenevassa siddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:109_7: taṃ paresaṃ vācāya pākaṭaṃ karonto paṇipātagamanañca gacchanto evaṃ vadati.
atk-vin02a2:110_4: Dasabhi cupetoti dasahi asekkhehi aṅgehi upeto.
atk-vin02a2:110_6: bhagavato hi cakkhuādīsu kiñci adantaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-vin02a2:111_1: Bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdīti bhagavantaṃ bhuttavantaṃ pattato ca apanītapāṇiṃ sallakkhetvā ekasmiṃ padese nisīdīti attho.
atk-vin02a2:111_2: Atthikānanti buddhābhivādanagamanena ca dhammasavanena ca atthikānaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:113_2: Tehi katikā katā hoti “yo paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati,
atk-vin02a2:113_3: so ārocetū”ti te kira ubhopi gihikāle upatisso kolitoti evaṃ paññāyamānanāmā aḍḍhateyyasatamāṇavakaparivārā giraggasamajjaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:113_5: “ayaṃ nāma evaṃ mahāsattanikāyo appatte vassasate maraṇamukhe patissatī”ti.
atk-vin02a2:113_6: Atha ubhopi uṭṭhitāya parisāya aññamaññaṃ pucchitvā ekajjhāsayā paccupaṭṭhitamaraṇasaññā sammantayiṃsu “samma maraṇe sati amatenāpi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:113_7: handa mayaṃ amataṃ pariyesāmā”ti amatapariyesanatthaṃ sañcayassa channaparibbājakassa santike saparisā
atk-vin02a2:113_8: pabbajitvā katipāheneva tassa ñāṇavisaye pāraṃ gantvā amataṃ apassantā pucchiṃsu “kiṃ nu kho, ācariya,
atk-vin02a2:113_11: ettakameva ida”nti ca sutvā “tucchaṃ idaṃ āvuso nissāraṃ,
atk-vin02a2:113_12: yo dāni amhesu paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati,
atk-vin02a2:114_1: Atthikehi upaññātaṃ magganti etaṃ anubandhanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ;
atk-vin02a2:114_3: “yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandheyyaṃ, kasmā?
atk-vin02a2:114_4: Yasmā idaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhanaṃ nāma atthikehi upaññātaṃ maggaṃ ñāto ceva upagato ca maggo”ti attho.
atk-vin02a2:114_5: Atha vā atthikehi amhehi “maraṇe sati amatenāpi bhavitabba”nti evaṃ kevalaṃ atthīti upaññātaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma,
atk-vin02a2:114_6: taṃ magganto pariyesantoti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a2:115_0: Piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya paṭikkamīti sudinnakaṇḍe vuttappakāraṃ aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nisīdi.
atk-vin02a2:115_1: Sāriputtopi kho “akālo kho tāva pañhaṃ pucchitu”nti kālaṃ āgamayamāno ekamantaṃ ṭhatvā vattapaṭipattipūraṇatthaṃ
atk-vin02a2:115_2: katabhattakiccassa therassa attano kamaṇḍaluto udakaṃ datvā dhotahatthapādena therena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-vin02a2:115_6: Na tāhaṃ sakkomīti na te ahaṃ sakkomi.
atk-vin02a2:115_7: Ettha ca paṭisambhidāppatto thero na ettakaṃ na sakkoti.
atk-vin02a2:115_8: Atha kho imassa dhammagāravaṃ uppādessāmīti sabbākārena buddhavisaye avisayabhāvaṃ gahetvā evamāha.
atk-vin02a2:116_0: Ye dhammā hetuppabhavāti hetuppabhavā nāma pañcakkhandhā;
atk-vin02a2:116_2: Tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato āhāti tesaṃ hetu nāma samudayasaccaṃ;
atk-vin02a2:116_4: Tesañca yo nirodhoti tesaṃ ubhinnampi saccānaṃ yo appavattinirodho;
atk-vin02a2:116_7: Maggasaccaṃ panettha sarūpato adassitampi nayato dassitaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a2:116_8: nirodhe hi vutte tassa sampāpako maggo vuttova hoti.
atk-vin02a2:116_9: Atha vā tesañca yo nirodhoti ettha tesaṃ yo nirodho ca nirodhupāyo cāti evaṃ dvepi saccāni dassitāni hontīti.
atk-vin02a2:117_0: Eseva dhammo yadi tāvadevāti sacepi ito uttari natthi,
atk-vin02a2:117_3: Paccabyattha padamasokanti yaṃ mayaṃ pariyesamānā vicarāma,
atk-vin02a2:117_6: Adiṭṭhaṃ abbhatītaṃ bahukehi kappanahutehīti amhehi nāma idaṃ padaṃ bahukehi kappanahutehi adiṭṭhameva abbhatītaṃ;
atk-vin02a2:117_7: iti tassa padassa adiṭṭhabhāvena dīgharattaṃ attano mahājānibhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-vin02a2:118_1: Gambhīre ñāṇavisayeti gambhīre ceva gambhīrassa ca ñāṇassa visayabhūte.
atk-vin02a2:118_4: Byākāsīti “etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati aggaṃ bhaddayuga”nti vadanto sāvakapāramiññāṇe byākāsi.
atk-vin02a2:118_5: Sāva tesaṃ āyasmantānaṃ upasampadā ahosīti sā ehibhikkhūpasampadāyeva tesaṃ upasampadā ahosi.
atk-vin02a2:118_6: Evaṃ upasampannesu ca tesu mahāmoggallānatthero sattahi divasehi arahatte patiṭṭhito,
atk-vin02a2:119_0: Atīte kira anomadassī nāma buddho loke udapādi.
atk-vin02a2:119_1: Tassa sarado nāma tāpaso sake assame nānāpupphehi maṇḍapaṃ katvā pupphāsaneyeva bhagavantaṃ nisīdāpetvā
atk-vin02a2:119_2: bhikkhusaṅghassāpi tatheva maṇḍapaṃ katvā pupphāsanāni paññapetvā aggasāvakabhāvaṃ patthesi.
atk-vin02a2:119_3: Patthayitvā ca sirīvaḍḍhassa nāma seṭṭhino pesesi “mayā aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:120_7: Magadhānaṃ giribbajanti magadhānaṃ janapadassa giribbajaṃ nagaraṃ.
atk-vin02a2:120_12: Kā usūyā vijānatanti dhammena nayantīti evaṃ vijānantānaṃ kā issā.
atk-vin02a2:123_8: Atha vā uṭṭhahitvā pattaṃ upanāmentīti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a2:123_9: Anujānāmi bhikkhave upajjhāyanti upajjhāyaṃ gahetuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a2:123_10: Puttacittaṃ upaṭṭhapessatīti putto me ayanti evaṃ gehassitapemavasena cittaṃ upaṭṭhapessati.
atk-vin02a2:123_15: Kāyena viññāpetīti evaṃ saddhivihārikena “upajjhāyo me bhante hohī”ti tikkhattuṃ vutte sace upajjhāyo
atk-vin02a2:123_16: “sāhū”tiādīsu pañcasu padesu yassa kassaci padassa vasena kāyena vā vācāya vā kāyavācāhi vā “gahito tayā
atk-vin02a2:123_20: yadidaṃ upajjhāyassa imesu pañcasu padesu yassa kassaci padassa vācāya vā sāvanaṃ kāyena vā atthaviññāpananti.
atk-vin02a2:123_21: Keci pana sādhūti sampaṭicchanaṃ sandhāya vadanti.
atk-vin02a2:123_25: Saddhivihārikenāpi na kevalaṃ iminā me padena upajjhāyo gahitoti ñātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:123_27: ahampi therassa bhāro”ti idampi ñātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:124_1: Tatrāyaṃ sammāvattanāti yaṃ vuttaṃ sammā vattitabbanti,
atk-vin02a2:124_3: Kālasseva uṭṭhāya upāhanā omuñcitvāti sacassa paccūsakāle caṅkamanatthāya vā dhotapādapariharaṇatthāya vā paṭimukkā upāhanā pādagatā honti,
atk-vin02a2:124_5: Dantakaṭṭhaṃ dātabbanti mahantaṃ majjhimaṃ khuddakanti tīṇi dantakaṭṭhāni upanetvā tato yaṃ tīṇi divasāni gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a2:124_7: Sace aniyamaṃ katvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a2:125_0: Mukhodakaṃ dātabbanti sītañca uṇhañca udakaṃ upanetvā tato yaṃ tīṇi divasāni vaḷañjeti,
atk-vin02a2:125_2: Sace aniyamaṃ katvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a2:125_6: Udakaṃ mukhadhovanaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā vaccakuṭito paṭṭhāya sammajjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:125_10: Sarīrakiccaṃ katvā āgantvā tasmiṃ nisinnassa “sace yāgu hotī”tiādinā nayena vuttavattaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:126_0: Saguṇaṃ katvāti dve cīvarāni ekato katvā,
atk-vin02a2:126_1: tā ekato katā dvepi saṅghāṭiyo dātabbā.
atk-vin02a2:126_5: Nātidūre gantabbaṃ nāccāsanneti ettha sace upajjhāyaṃ nivattitvā olokentaṃ ekena vā dvīhi vā padavītihārehi sampāpuṇāti,
atk-vin02a2:126_6: ettāvatā nātidūre nāccāsanne gato hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:126_7: Pattapariyāpannaṃ paṭiggahetabbanti sace upajjhāyena bhikkhācāre yāguyā vā bhatte vā laddhe patto uṇho vā bhāriko vā hoti,
atk-vin02a2:126_8: attano pattaṃ tassa datvā so patto gahetabboti attho.
atk-vin02a2:126_9: Na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassa antarantarā kathā opātetabbāti antaraghare vā aññatra vā bhaṇamānassa aniṭṭhite
atk-vin02a2:126_10: tassa vacane aññā kathā na samuṭṭhāpetabbā.
atk-vin02a2:126_11: Ito paṭṭhāya ca pana yattha yattha nakārena paṭisedho kariyati,
atk-vin02a2:126_14: Āpattisāmantā bhaṇamānoti padasodhammaduṭṭhullādivasena āpattiyā āsannavācaṃ bhaṇamāno.
atk-vin02a2:126_15: Nivāretabboti “kiṃ bhante īdisaṃ nāma vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a2:126_16: āpatti na hotī”ti evaṃ pucchantena viya vāretabbo.
atk-vin02a2:127_0: Paṭhamataraṃ āgantvāti sace āsanne gāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a2:127_5: teneva saddhiṃ gāmato nikkhamitvā cīvarena pattaṃ veṭhetvā antarāmaggato paṭhamataraṃ āgantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:127_6: Evaṃ nivattantena paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā āsanapaññāpanādi sabbaṃ kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:127_8: Caturaṅgulaṃ kaṇṇaṃ ussāretvāti kaṇṇaṃ caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ atirekaṃ katvā evaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃharitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:127_11: Samaṃ katvā saṃharitassa hi majjhe bhaṅgo hoti,
atk-vin02a2:127_12: tato niccaṃ bhijjamānaṃ dubbalaṃ hoti taṃ nivāraṇatthametaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:127_13: Tasmā yathā ajja bhaṅgaṭṭhāneyeva sve na bhijjati,
atk-vin02a2:127_14: tathā divase divase caturaṅgulaṃ ussāretvā saṃharitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:127_15: Obhoge kāyabandhanaṃ kātabbanti kāyabandhanaṃ saṃharitvā cīvarabhoge pakkhipitvā ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:128_0: Sace piṇḍapāto hotīti ettha yo gāmeyeva vā antaraghare vā paṭikkamane vā bhuñjitvā āgacchati,
atk-vin02a2:128_3: gāme abhuttassa pana laddhabhikkhassa vā hoti;
atk-vin02a2:128_7: udakaṃ datvā attanā laddhatopi piṇḍapāto upanetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:128_8: Pānīyena pucchitabboti bhuñjamāno tikkhattuṃ “pānīyaṃ bhante āhariyatū”ti pānīyena pucchitabbo.
atk-vin02a2:128_12: pānīyaṃ upajjhāyassa santike ṭhapetvā sayampi bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:129_0: Anantarahitāyāti taṭṭikadhammakhaṇḍādīsu yena kenaci anatthatāya paṃsusakkharamissāya bhūmiyā pattho na ṭhapetabboti attho.
atk-vin02a2:129_1: Sace pana kāḷavaṇṇakatā vā sudhābaddhā vā hoti nirajamattikā,
atk-vin02a2:129_5: Tatra pana paṇṇaṃ vā ādhārakaṃ vā ṭhapetvā tatra nikkhipitabbo.
atk-vin02a2:129_6: Pārato antaṃ orato bhoganti idaṃ cīvaravaṃsādīnaṃ heṭṭhā hatthaṃ pavesetvā abhimukhena hatthena saṇikaṃ nikkhipanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:129_7: Ante pana gahetvā bhogena cīvaravaṃsādīnaṃ upari nikkhipantassa bhittiyaṃ bhogo paṭihaññati,
atk-vin02a2:130_0: Cuṇṇaṃ sannetabbanti nhānacuṇṇaṃ udakena temetvā piṇḍi kātabbā.
atk-vin02a2:130_1: Ekamantaṃ nikkhipitabbanti ekasmiṃ niddhūme ṭhāne ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:130_2: Jantāghare parikammaṃ nāma aṅgāramattikauṇhodakadānādikaṃ sabbaṃ kiccaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:130_4: Pānīyena pucchitabboti jantāghare uṇhasantāpena pipāsā hoti,
atk-vin02a2:131_2: agilānena hi saddhivihārikena saṭṭhivassenāpi sabbaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:131_4: Nakārapaṭisaṃyuttesu pana padesu gilānassāpi paṭikkhittakiriyaṃ karontassa dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin02a2:131_8: Ullokā paṭhamaṃ ohāretabbanti ullokato paṭhamaṃ ullokaṃ ādiṃkatvā avaharitabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a2:131_9: Ālokasandhikaṇṇabhāgāti ālokasandhibhāgā ca kaṇṇabhāgā ca antarabāhiravātapānakavāṭakāni ca gabbhassa ca cattāro koṇā pamajjitabbāti attho.
atk-vin02a2:132_0: Yathāpaññattaṃ paññapetabbanti yathā paṭhamaṃ paññattaṃ ahosi,
atk-vin02a2:132_2: Etadatthameva hi yathāpaññattaṃ sallakkhetvā nīharitvā ekamantaṃ nikkhipitabbanti purimavattaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:132_3: Sace pana paṭhamaṃ ajānantena kenaci paññattaṃ ahosi,
atk-vin02a2:132_4: samantato bhittiṃ dvaṅgulamattena vā tivaṅgulamattena vā mocetvā paññapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:132_8: Sace koṭiṃ nivattetvā bandhituṃ na jānāti,
atk-vin02a2:132_10: Puratthimā vātapānā thaketabbāti puratthimāya vātapānā thaketabbā.
atk-vin02a2:133_1: Vūpakāsāpetabboti añño bhikkhu vattabbo “theraṃ gahetvā aññattha gacchā”ti vivecetabbanti vissajjāpetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:133_3: Ussukkaṃ kātabbanti parivāsadānatthaṃ so so bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā yācitabbo.
atk-vin02a2:133_8: Kinti nu khoti kena nu kho upāyena.
atk-vin02a2:133_10: Lahukāya vā pariṇāmeyyāti ukkhepanīyaṃ akatvā tajjanīyaṃ vā niyassaṃ vā kareyyāti attho.
atk-vin02a2:133_11: Tena hi “upajjhāyassa ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kattukāmo saṅgho”ti ñatvā ekamekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā “mā
atk-vin02a2:133_12: bhante amhākaṃ upajjhāyassa kammaṃ karitthā”ti yācitabbā.
atk-vin02a2:133_17: Iti taṃ sammā vattāpetvā “paṭippassambhetha bhante kamma”nti bhikkhū yācitabbā.
atk-vin02a2:134_1: Na ca acchinne theve pakkamitabbanti yadi appamattakampi rajanaṃ gaḷati,
atk-vin02a2:134_3: Na upajjhāyaṃ anāpucchā ekaccassa patto dātabbotiādi sabbaṃ upajjhāyassa visabhāgapuggalavasena kathitaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:134_4: Na upajjhāyaṃ anāpucchā gāmo pavisitabboti piṇḍāya vā aññena vā karaṇīyena pavisitukāmena āpucchitvāva pavisitabbo.
atk-vin02a2:134_5: Sace upajjhāyo kālasseva vuṭṭhāya dūraṃ bhikkhācāraṃ gantukāmo hoti,
atk-vin02a2:134_7: Avatvā gate pariveṇaṃ gantvā upajjhāyaṃ apassantena gāmaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:135_0: Na susānaṃ gantabbanti vāsatthāya vā dassanatthāya vā na gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:135_1: Na disā pakkamitabbāti ettha pakkamitukāmena kammaṃ ācikkhitvā yāvatatiyaṃ yācitabbo.
atk-vin02a2:135_4: taṃ nissāya vasato cassa uddeso vā paripucchā vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā na sampajjati,
atk-vin02a2:135_6: kevalaṃ attano santike vasāpetukāmatāya eva gantuṃ na deti,
atk-vin02a2:135_8: Vuṭṭhānamassa āgametabbanti gelaññato vuṭṭhānaṃ assa āgametabbaṃ;
atk-vin02a2:135_11: bhesajjaṃ pariyesitvā tassa hatthe datvā “bhante ayaṃ upaṭṭhahissatī”ti vatvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:138_2: saṅgahetabbo anuggahetabboti uddesādīhissa saṅgaho ca anuggaho ca kattabbo.
atk-vin02a2:138_8: Api ca otiṇṇe vā anotiṇṇe vā paṭhamaṃ vacanaṃ ovādo;
atk-vin02a2:138_10: Sace upajjhāyassa patto hotīti sace atirekapatto hoti.
atk-vin02a2:138_13: Idha ussukkaṃ nāma dhammikena nayena uppajjamānaupāyapariyesanaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:138_14: Ito paraṃ dantakaṭṭhadānaṃ ādiṃ katvā ācamanakumbhiyā udakāsiñcanapariyosānaṃ vattaṃ gilānasseva saddhivihārikassa kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:138_16: Cīvaraṃ rajantenāti “evaṃ rajeyyāsī”ti upajjhāyato upāyaṃ sutvā rajantena.
atk-vin02a2:141_1: Na sammā vattantīti yathāpaññattaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ na pūrenti.
atk-vin02a2:141_2: Yo na sammā vatteyyāti yo yathāpaññattaṃ vattaṃ na pūreyya;
atk-vin02a2:141_5: Na adhimattaṃ pemaṃ hotīti upajjhāyamhi adhimattaṃ gehassitapemaṃ na hoti.
atk-vin02a2:141_6: Nādhimattā bhāvanā hotīti adhimattā mettābhāvanā na hoti;
atk-vin02a2:142_0: Appaṇāmento upajjhāyo sātisāro hotīti sadoso hoti,
atk-vin02a2:142_3: Na sammāvattanāya ca yāva cīvararajanaṃ tāva vatte akariyamāne upajjhāyassa parihāni hoti.
atk-vin02a2:142_4: Tasmā taṃ akarontassa nissayamuttakassāpi amuttakassāpi āpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a2:143_6: Upajjhāye vattaṃ sādiyante saddhivihārikā bahukāpi honti,
atk-vin02a2:143_9: tumhe attano sajjhāyamanasikārādīsu yogaṃ karothā”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a2:143_11: Sace upajjhāyo sādiyanaṃ vā asādiyanaṃ vā na jānāti,
atk-vin02a2:143_14: Tesu eko vattasampanno bhikkhu “upajjhāyassa kiccaṃ ahaṃ karissāmi,
atk-vin02a2:143_15: tumhe appossukkā viharathā”ti evañce attano bhāraṃ katvā itare vissajjeti,
atk-vin02a2:146_2: kiñcāpi āyasmā sāriputto bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi anuññātaṃ pabbajjañceva upasampadañca jānāti,
atk-vin02a2:146_3: bhagavā pana taṃ lahukaṃ upasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ñatticatutthakammena garukaṃ katvā upasampadaṃ anuññātukāmo.
atk-vin02a2:146_4: Athassa thero ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā “kathāhaṃ bhante taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pabbājemi upasampādemī”ti āha.
atk-vin02a2:147_0: Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalenāti ettha byatto nāma yassa sāṭṭhakathaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ vācuggataṃ pavattati,
atk-vin02a2:147_1: tasmiṃ asati yassa antamaso idaṃ ñatticatutthakammavācāmattampi suggahitaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a2:147_4: Yo pana kāsasosasemhādinā vā gelaññena oṭṭhadantajivhādīnaṃ vā asampattiyā pariyattiyaṃ vā akataparicayattā
atk-vin02a2:147_5: na sakkoti parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi kammavācaṃ sāvetuṃ,
atk-vin02a2:149_3: Yasmā cattāro paccaye nissāya attabhāvo pavattati,
atk-vin02a2:152_1: Kintāyaṃ bhikkhu hotīti kiṃ te ayaṃ bhikkhu hoti.
atk-vin02a2:152_2: Aññehi ovadiyo anusāsiyoti aññehi ovaditabbo ceva anusāsitabbo ca.
atk-vin02a2:152_3: Bāhullāya āvatto yadidaṃ gaṇabandhikanti gaṇabandho etassa bāhullassa atthīti gaṇabandhikaṃ, bāhullaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:152_5: tadatthāya atilahuṃ tvaṃ āpannoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a2:153_3: So kira “dhammaṃ thenessāmī”ti udāyittherassa santike pabbajitvā tena sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno tassa vādaṃ āropesi.
atk-vin02a2:153_4: Anujānāmi bhikkhave byattena bhikkhunātiādimhi byatto pubbe bhikkhunovādakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttalakkhaṇoyeva.
atk-vin02a2:153_5: Yo pana antevāsino vā saddhivihārikassa vā gilānassa sakkoti upaṭṭhānādīni kātuṃ,
atk-vin02a2:154_5: Paṭibalo hoti antevāsiṃ vā saddhivihāriṃ vā gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ vā upaṭṭhāpetuṃ vā,
atk-vin02a2:155_2: Anujānāmi bhikkhave ācariyanti ācārasamācārasikkhāpanakaṃ ācariyaṃ anujānāmi.
atk-vin02a2:155_3: Ācariyo bhikkhave antevāsikamhītiādi sabbaṃ “upajjhāyo bhikkhave saddhivihārikamhī”tiādinā nayena vuttavaseneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:158_1: Antevāsikā ācariyesu na sammā vattantīti ettha pana yaṃ pubbe “nasammāvattanāya ca yāva cīvararajanaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:158_2: tāva vatte akariyamāne upajjhāyassa parihāni hoti,
atk-vin02a2:158_3: tasmā taṃ akarontassa nissayamuttakassāpi amuttakassāpi āpattiyevā”ti ca,
atk-vin02a2:158_4: “ekaccassa pattadānato paṭṭhāya amuttakanissayasseva āpattī”ti ca lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:158_5: na teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a2:158_6: Nissayantevāsikena hi yāva ācariyaṃ nissāya vasati,
atk-vin02a2:158_8: Pabbajjāupasampadādhammantevāsikehi pana nissayamuttakehipi ādito paṭṭhāya yāva cīvararajanaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:158_11: Etesu ca pabbajjantevāsiko ca upasampadantevāsiko ca ācariyassa yāvajīvaṃ bhāro.
atk-vin02a2:158_12: Nissayantevāsiko ca dhammantevāsiko ca yāva samīpe vasanti, tāvadeva.
atk-vin02a2:158_14: Ācariyantevāsikesu hi yo yo na sammā vattati,
atk-vin02a2:161_3: pakkantoti tamhā āvāsā vippavasitukāmo pakkanto disaṃ gato.
atk-vin02a2:161_4: Evaṃ gate ca pana tasmiṃ sace vihāre nissayadāyako atthi,
atk-vin02a2:161_5: yassa santike aññadāpi nissayo vā gahitapubbo hoti,
atk-vin02a2:161_11: tassa lajjīpesalabhāvaṃ jānantena tadaheva nissayo yācitabbo.
atk-vin02a2:161_14: Atha pana “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo lahuṃ āgamissatī”ti pucchati,
atk-vin02a2:161_17: Sace vadati “tena hi upajjhāyassa āgamanaṃ āgamethā”ti vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:161_18: Atha panassa pakatiyā pesalabhāvaṃ na jānāti,
atk-vin02a2:161_19: cattāri pañca divasāni tassa bhikkhuno sabhāgataṃ oloketvā okāsaṃ kāretvā nissayo gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:162_4: Athāpi naṃ tattha manussā paricchinnakālato uttaripi pañca vā dasa vā divasāni vāsentiyeva,
atk-vin02a2:162_5: tena vihāraṃ pavatti pesetabbā “daharā mā ukkaṇṭhantu,
atk-vin02a2:162_8: Atha āgacchato antarāmagge nadīpūrena vā corādīhi vā upaddavo hoti,
atk-vin02a2:163_0: Vibbhante pana kālaṅkate pakkhasaṅkante vā ekadivasampi parihāro natthi.
atk-vin02a2:163_4: Tasmā “paṇāmemi ta”nti vā “mā idha paṭikkamī”ti vā “nīhara te pattacīvara”nti vā “nāhaṃ tayā upaṭṭhātabbo”ti
atk-vin02a2:163_5: vāti iminā pāḷinayena “mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchī”tiādinā pāḷimuttakanayena vā yo nissayapaṇāmanāya
atk-vin02a2:164_1: daṇḍakammaṃ āharitvā tikkhattuṃ tāva sayameva khamāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:164_7: aññattha gantvā upajjhāyassa sabhāgānaṃ santike vasitabbaṃ “appeva nāma sabhāgānaṃ me santike vasatīti ñatvāpi khameyyā”ti.
atk-vin02a2:164_10: Tatra ce dubbhikkhādidosena na sakkā hoti vasituṃ,
atk-vin02a2:164_11: taṃyeva vihāraṃ āgantvā aññassa santike nissayaṃ gahetvā vasituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:165_0: Ācariyamhā nissayapaṭippassaddhīsu ācariyo pakkanto vā hotīti ettha koci ācariyo āpucchitvā pakkamati,
atk-vin02a2:165_3: Tatra sace antevāsiko ācariyaṃ āpucchati “asukaṃ nāma bhante ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ icchāmi kenacideva karaṇīyenā”ti,
atk-vin02a2:165_4: ācariyena ca “kadā gamissasī”ti vutto “sāyanhe vā rattiṃ vā uṭṭhahitvā gamissāmī”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a2:166_0: Sace pana “bhante asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gantukāmomhī”ti vutte ācariyo “asukasmiṃ nāma gāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchā jānissasī”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a2:166_6: rattiṃ mantetvā jānissāmā”ti vutto mantetvā gacchati, sugato.
atk-vin02a2:166_9: Ācariyaṃ anāpucchā pakkamantassa pana upacārasīmātikkame nissayo paṭippassambhati.
atk-vin02a2:167_0: Sace pana ācariyo antevāsikaṃ āpucchati “āvuso asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gamissāmī”ti,
atk-vin02a2:167_1: antevāsikena ca “kadā”ti vutte “sāyanhe vā rattibhāge vā”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a2:168_0: Sace pana ācariyo “sve piṇḍāya caritvā gamissāmī”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a2:168_4: “Asukasmiṃ nāma gāme piṇḍāya caritvā jānissāmi mama gamanaṃ vā agamanaṃ vā”ti vatvā sace na gacchati,
atk-vin02a2:168_7: rattiṃ mantetvā jānissathā”ti vutto mantetvāpi na gacchati,
atk-vin02a2:169_0: Sace ubhopi ācariyantevāsikā kenaci karaṇīyena bahisīmaṃ gacchanti,
atk-vin02a2:169_1: tato ce ācariyo gamiyacitte uppanne anāpucchāva gantvā dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antoyeva nivattati,
atk-vin02a2:169_5: Ācariyupajjhāyā dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma aññasmiṃ vihāre vasanti,
atk-vin02a2:170_0: Ācariye vibbhante kālaṅkate pakkhasaṅkante ca taṅkhaṇaññeva paṭippassambhati.
atk-vin02a2:170_1: Āṇattiyaṃ pana sacepi ācariyo muñcitukāmova hutvā nissayapaṇāmanāya paṇāmeti,
atk-vin02a2:170_3: atha kho hadayena muduko”ti sālayova hoti,
atk-vin02a2:170_7: “na dāni imaṃ nissāya vasissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati,
atk-vin02a2:171_0: Upajjhāyena vā samodhānagatoti ettha dassanasavanavasena samodhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:171_1: Sace hi ācariyaṃ nissāya vasanto saddhivihāriko ekavihāre cetiyaṃ vā vandantaṃ ekagāme piṇḍāya vā carantaṃ upajjhāyaṃ passati,
atk-vin02a2:171_6: Maggappaṭipannaṃ vā ākāsena vā gacchantaṃ upajjhāyaṃ disvā dūrattā bhikkhūti jānāti,
atk-vin02a2:171_14: āsanasālāya vā nisinnaṃ adisvāva ekamante bhuñjitvā pakkamati,
atk-vin02a2:171_15: dhammassavanamaṇḍape vā nisinnampi taṃ adisvāva dhammaṃ sutvā pakkamati,
atk-vin02a2:172_0: Savanavasena pana sace upajjhāyassa vihāre vā antaraghare vā dhammaṃ kathentassa anumodanaṃ vā karontassa
atk-vin02a2:172_3: Asañjānantassa na paṭippassambhatīti ayaṃ samodhāne vinicchayo.
atk-vin02a2:175_1: Idāni yaṃ pubbe “anujānāmi bhikkhave byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena dasavassena vā atirekadasavassena vā upasampādetuṃ,
atk-vin02a2:175_2: nissayaṃ dātu”nti saṅkhepato upajjhāyācariyānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:175_7: So hi sīlakkhandhādīhi asamannāgatattāva aguṇaṅgehi samannāgato hoti.
atk-vin02a2:175_8: Na upasampādetabbanti upajjhāyena hutvā na upasampādetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:175_9: Na nissayo dātabboti ācariyena hutvā nissayo na dātabbo.
atk-vin02a2:175_10: Ettha ca na asekkhena sīlakkhandhenāti ca attanā na asekkhenāti ca assaddhoti ca ādīsu tīsu pañcakesu ayuttavasena paṭikkhepo kato,
atk-vin02a2:175_12: Yo hi asekkhehi sīlakkhandhādīhi asamannāgato pare ca tattha samādapetuṃ asakkonto assaddhiyādidosayuttova hutvā parisaṃ pariharati,
atk-vin02a2:175_15: Tasmā tena na upasampādetabbantiādi ayuttavasena vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:175_17: Na hi khīṇāsavasseva upajjhāyācariyabhāvo bhagavatā anuññāto.
atk-vin02a2:175_19: “sace upajjhāyassa anabhirati uppannā hotī”tiādiṃ na vadeyya.
atk-vin02a2:175_20: Yasmā pana khīṇāsavassa parisā sīlādīhi na parihāyati,
atk-vin02a2:175_21: tasmā “pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:176_0: Adhisīle sīlavipannotiādīsu pārājikañca saṅghādisesañca āpanno adhisīle sīlavipanno nāma.
atk-vin02a2:176_1: Itare pañcāpattikkhandhe āpanno ajjhācāre ācāravipanno nāma.
atk-vin02a2:176_2: Sammādiṭṭhiṃ pahāya antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno nāma.
atk-vin02a2:176_7: Imasmiṃ pañcake purimāni tīṇi padāni ayuttavasena vuttāni,
atk-vin02a2:177_0: Āpattiṃ na jānātīti “idaṃ nāma mayā kata”nti vutte “imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ ayaṃ āpanno”ti na jānāti.
atk-vin02a2:177_1: Vuṭṭhānaṃ na jānātīti vuṭṭhānagāminito vā desanāgāminito vā āpattito evaṃ nāma vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti na jānāti.
atk-vin02a2:177_2: Imasmiṃ pañcake purimāni dve padāni ayuttavasena vuttāni,
atk-vin02a2:178_0: Ābhisamācārikāya sikkhāyāti khandhakavatte vinetuṃ na paṭibalo hotīti attho.
atk-vin02a2:178_1: Ādibrahmacariyakāyāti sekkhapaṇṇattiyaṃ vinetuṃ na paṭibaloti attho.
atk-vin02a2:178_2: Abhidhammeti nāmarūpaparicchede vinetuṃ na paṭibaloti attho.
atk-vin02a2:178_3: Abhivinayeti sakale vinayapiṭake vinetuṃ na paṭibaloti attho.
atk-vin02a2:178_4: Vinetuṃ na paṭibaloti ca sabbattha sikkhāpetuṃ na sakkotīti attho.
atk-vin02a2:178_11: pañcame dve padānīti sabbepi cattāro pañcakā ayuttavasena vuttā.
atk-vin02a2:178_14: chaṭṭhasattamaaṭṭhamā tayo pañcakāti sabbepi cattāro pañcakā āpattiaṅgavasena vuttā;
atk-vin02a2:181_4: Tattha ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena na svāgatāni hontīti ubhatovibhaṅgavasena na svāgatāni.
atk-vin02a2:181_7: Na suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanasoti mātikāto ca vibhaṅgato ca na suṭṭhu vinicchitāni.
atk-vin02a2:184_4: Yo pana aññopi nayidha pabbajitapubbo āgacchati,
atk-vin02a2:184_5: tasmiṃ yaṃ kattabbaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ “yo so bhikkhave aññopī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a2:184_6: Tattha tassa cattāro māse parivāso dātabboti ayaṃ titthiyaparivāso nāma;
atk-vin02a2:184_8: Ayaṃ pana naggaparibbājakasseva ājīvakassa vā acelakassa vā dātabbo.
atk-vin02a2:184_9: Sace sopi sāṭakaṃ vā vāḷakambalādīnaṃ aññataraṃ titthiyaddhajaṃ vā nivāsetvā āgacchati,
atk-vin02a2:185_0: Paṭhamaṃ kesamassuntiādinā tassa āditova sāmaṇerapabbajjaṃ dasseti.
atk-vin02a2:185_1: Evaṃ pabbājentehi pana tasmiṃ saṅghamajjhe nisinneyeva “tvaṃ pabbājehi,
atk-vin02a2:185_3: tvaṃ upajjhāyo hohī”ti therā bhikkhū na vattabbā.
atk-vin02a2:185_4: Evaṃ vuttā hi sace tassa ācariyupajjhāyabhāvena jigucchantā na sampaṭicchanti,
atk-vin02a2:185_5: atha so “nayime mayhaṃ saddahantī”ti kujjhitvāpi gaccheyya.
atk-vin02a2:185_6: Tasmā taṃ ekamantaṃ netvā tassa ācariyupajjhāyā pariyesitabbā.
atk-vin02a2:186_1: Evaṃ kho bhikkhave aññatitthiyapubbo ārādhako hoti,
atk-vin02a2:186_4: Tattha atikālena gāmaṃ pavisatīti bhikkhūnaṃ vattakaraṇavelāyameva gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-vin02a2:186_5: Atidivā paṭikkamatīti kulagharesu itthipurisadārakadārikādīhi saddhiṃ gehassitakathaṃ kathento tattheva
atk-vin02a2:186_6: bhuñjitvā bhikkhūsu pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā uddesaparipucchādīni vā karontesu paṭisallīnesu vā āgacchati;
atk-vin02a2:186_9: Evampi bhikkhave aññatitthiyapubbo anārādhako hotīti evampi karonto parivāsavattassa sampādako pūrako na hoti.
atk-vin02a2:187_0: Vesiyāgocaro vātiādīsu vesiyāti āmisakiñcikkhasampadānādinā sulabhajjhācārā rūpūpajīvikā itthiyo.
atk-vin02a2:187_1: Vidhavāti matapatikā vā pavutthapatikā vā itthiyo;
atk-vin02a2:187_2: tā yena kenaci saddhiṃ mittabhāvaṃ patthenti.
atk-vin02a2:187_7: te pariḷāhavegābhibhūtā yena kenaci saddhiṃ mittabhāvaṃ patthenti.
atk-vin02a2:188_0: Tattha vesiyānaṃ kulesu kulupako hutvā piṇḍapātacariyādīhi vā apadisitvā sinehasanthavajātena hadayena
atk-vin02a2:188_2: so nacirasseva “asukavesiyā saddhiṃ gato”ti vattabbataṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-vin02a2:188_5: bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ gantvā saddhiṃyeva bhuñjitvā vā gahetvā vā āgantuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:188_6: Gilānā bhikkhuniyo ovadituṃ vā dhammaṃ vā desetuṃ uddesaparipucchādīni vā dātuṃ gacchantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:188_7: Yo pana tathā āgantvā mittasanthavavasena gacchati,
atk-vin02a2:189_1: Tattha ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā samaggena saṅghena sannipatitvā kattabbāni cetiyamahāpāsādapaṭisaṅkharaṇādīni kammāni uccāni nāma.
atk-vin02a2:189_2: Cīvaradhovanarajanādīni khandhakapariyāpannāni ca aggisālavattādīni ābhisamācārikāni avacāni nāma.
atk-vin02a2:189_3: Tattha na dakkho hotīti tesu kammesu cheko susikkhito na hoti.
atk-vin02a2:189_5: “bhikkhusaṅghassa kammaṃ atthī”ti sutvā pageva bhattakiccaṃ katvā gabbhantaraṃ pavisitvā yāvadatthaṃ supitvā sāyaṃ nikkhamati.
atk-vin02a2:189_9: idamevaṃ na kattabba”nti tasmiṃyeva khaṇe uppannapaññāya samannāgato na hoti.
atk-vin02a2:189_10: Na alaṃ kātuṃ na alaṃ saṃvidhātunti sahatthāpi kātuṃ samattho na hoti;
atk-vin02a2:189_16: ko dāni imaṃ karissatī”ti evaṃ ussāhaṃ janetvā saṃvidhātuṃ aññamaññaṃ kāretumpi samattho na hoti.
atk-vin02a2:189_17: Bhikkhūhi “kammaṃ karissāmā”ti vutte kiñci rogaṃ apadisati,
atk-vin02a2:190_0: Na tibbacchando hotīti balavacchando na hoti.
atk-vin02a2:191_3: Idāni sāyeva laddhi yasmā tassa titthakarassa khamati ceva ruccati ca “idameva sacca”nti ca daḷhaggāhena gahitā;
atk-vin02a2:191_4: tasmā tassa khanti ruci ādāyoti vuccati.
atk-vin02a2:191_11: Idaṃ bhikkhave saṅghātanikaṃ aññatitthiyapubbassa anārādhanīyasminti bhikkhave yamidaṃ tassa satthuno
atk-vin02a2:191_12: tasseva ca laddhiyā avaṇṇe bhaññamāne “kiṃ ime paraṃ garahantī”ti kāyavacīvikāranibbattakaṃ anattamanattaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:191_14: yañca tasseva satthuno tasseva ca laddhiyā vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamanattaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:191_17: anārādhake parivāsavattaṃ apūrake kamme idaṃ liṅgaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:191_20: Evaṃ anārādhako kho bhikkhave aññatitthiyapubbo āgato na upasampādetabboti ito ekenapi aṅgena samannāgato na upasampādetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:192_0: Evaṃ ārādhako kho bhikkhaveti evaṃ nātikālena gāmappavesanā nātidivā paṭikkamanaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:192_7: buddhādīnaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇane attamanatāti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ titthiyavattānaṃ paripūraṇena ārādhako paritosako
atk-vin02a2:193_0: Sace pana upasampadamāḷakepi ekaṃ vattaṃ bhindati,
atk-vin02a2:193_2: Yathā pana bhinnasikkhāya sikkhamānāya puna sikkhāpadāni ca sikkhāsammuti ca diyyati,
atk-vin02a2:193_6: Sace parivasanto antarā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbatteti,
atk-vin02a2:193_10: Sace pana parivasanto cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggaṇhati,
atk-vin02a2:193_16: Sace pana vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-vin02a2:193_18: Samūhatāni sabbadiṭṭhigatāni abbuḷhaṃ vicikicchāsallaṃ taṃdivasameva upasampādetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:194_0: Upajjhāyamūlakaṃ cīvaraṃ pariyesitabbanti upajjhāyaṃ issaraṃ katvā tassa cīvaraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:194_6: tehipi upajjhāyasseva dātabbaṃ “idaṃ tumhākaṃ katvā imassa dethā”ti. Kasmā?
atk-vin02a2:194_7: Titthiyā nāma vilomā honti “saṅghena me pattacīvaraṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:194_8: kiṃ mayhaṃ tumhesu āyatta”nti vatvā ovādānusāsaniṃ na kareyyuṃ,
atk-vin02a2:194_9: upajjhāyena pana āyattajīvikattā tassa vacanakaro bhavissati.
atk-vin02a2:195_2: Ete bhikkhave kiriyavādinoti ete kiriyaṃ na paṭibāhanti,
atk-vin02a2:195_5: Sabbabuddhā hi nekkhammapāramiṃ pūrayamānā etadeva pabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pūresuṃ,
atk-vin02a2:195_10: Imāhaṃ bhikkhave ñātīnaṃ āveṇikaṃ parihāraṃ dammīti imaṃ ahaṃ tesaṃ pāṭekkaṃ odissakaṃ parihāraṃ dadāmi.
atk-vin02a2:195_12: Te hi titthāyatane pabbajitāpi sāsanassa avaṇṇakāmā na honti,
atk-vin02a2:198_1: Magadhesu pañca ābādhā ussannā hontīti magadhanāmake janapade manussānañca amanussānañca pañca rogā ussannā vuḍḍhippattā phātippattā honti.
atk-vin02a2:198_3: Na bhikkhave pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭho pabbājetabboti ye te kuṭṭhādayo pañca ābādhā ussannā,
atk-vin02a2:199_0: Tattha kuṭṭhanti rattakuṭṭhaṃ vā hotu kāḷakuṭṭhaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a2:199_4: Sace pana nivāsanapārupanehi pakatipaṭicchanne ṭhāne nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇaṃ avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ hoti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:199_5: Mukhe pana hatthapādapiṭṭhesu vā sacepi avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ nakhapiṭṭhito ca khuddakatarampi,
atk-vin02a2:200_0: Gaṇḍoti medagaṇḍo vā hotu añño vā yo koci kolaṭṭhimattakopi ce vaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhito gaṇḍo hoti,
atk-vin02a2:200_2: Paṭicchannaṭṭhāne pana kolaṭṭhimatte avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhito vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:200_3: Mukhādike appaṭicchannaṭṭhāne avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitopi na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:200_4: Tikicchāpetvā pabbājentenāpi sarīraṃ sañchaviṃ kāretvāva pabbājetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:200_5: Uṇṇigaṇḍā nāma honti gothanā viya aṅgulikā viya ca tattha tattha lambanti,
atk-vin02a2:200_8: Daharakāle khīrapiḷakā yobbannakāle ca mukhe kharapiḷakā nāma honti,
atk-vin02a2:200_12: Aññe pana sarīre kharapiḷakā nāma aparā padumakaṇṇikā nāma honti,
atk-vin02a2:200_13: aññā sāsapabījakā nāma sāsapamattā eva sakalasarīraṃ pharanti,
atk-vin02a2:201_0: Kilāsoti na bhijjanakaṃ na paggharaṇakaṃ padumapuṇḍarīkapattavaṇṇaṃ kuṭṭhaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:201_1: yena gunnaṃ viya sabalaṃ sarīraṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a2:201_6: tattha pubbaverikena amanussena gahito duttikiccho hoti.
atk-vin02a2:201_7: Appamattakepi pana apamāre sati na pabbājetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:204_3: Core palāpetvā corabhayena vuṭṭhite gāme āvāsāpetvā ārakkhaṃ datvā kasikammādīni pavattāpethāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a2:204_6: Upajjhāyassa deva sīsaṃ chinditabbantiādi sabbaṃ “pabbajjāya upajjhāyo seṭṭho,
atk-vin02a2:204_8: tato gaṇo”ti cintetvā idaṃ vohāre aḍḍavinicchaye āgatanti āhaṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:204_9: Na bhikkhave rājabhaṭo pabbājetabboti ettha amacco vā hotu mahāmatto vā sevako vā kiñci ṭhānantaraṃ patto vā appatto vā,
atk-vin02a2:204_13: Tassa pana puttanattabhātukā ye rājato bhattavetanaṃ na gaṇhanti,
atk-vin02a2:204_15: Yo pana rājato laddhaṃ nibaddhabhogaṃ vā māsasaṃvaccharaparibbayaṃ vā raññoyeva niyyāteti,
atk-vin02a2:204_16: puttabhātuke vā taṃ ṭhānaṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā rājānaṃ “na dānāhaṃ devassa bhaṭo”ti āpucchati,
atk-vin02a2:204_17: yena vā yaṃ kammakāraṇā vetanaṃ gahitaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:204_19: yo vā pabbajassūti raññā anuññāto hoti,
atk-vin02a2:207_2: manussā passitvāti yehi gihikāle diṭṭhapubbo ye ca “ayaṃ so”ti aññesaṃ suṇanti,
atk-vin02a2:207_8: tasmā āyatiṃ akaraṇatthāya bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento evamāha.
atk-vin02a2:207_9: Tattha dhajaṃ bandhitvā viya vicaratīti dhajabandho.
atk-vin02a2:207_10: Mūladevādayo viya loke pākaṭoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a2:207_11: Tasmā yo gāmaghātaṃ vā panthaduhanaṃ vā nagare sandhicchedādikammaṃ vā karonto vicarati,
atk-vin02a2:207_12: paññāyati ca “asuko nāma idaṃ idaṃ karotī”ti,
atk-vin02a2:207_14: Yo pana rājaputto rajjaṃ patthento gāmaghātādīni karoti,
atk-vin02a2:207_19: Pubbe mahājane pākaṭo coro pacchā corakammaṃ pahāya pañcasīlādīni samādiyati,
atk-vin02a2:207_22: Ye pana ambalabujādicorakā sandhicchedādicorā eva vā adissamānā theyyaṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a2:207_23: pacchāpi iminā nāma idaṃ katanti na paññāyanti,
atk-vin02a2:208_3: ete pana laddhābhayattā na bhayūvarāti abhayūvarā;
atk-vin02a2:208_5: Na bhikkhave kārabhedako pabbājetabboti kāro vuccati bandhanāgāraṃ.
atk-vin02a2:208_6: Idha pana andubandhanaṃ vā hotu saṅkhalikabandhanaṃ vā rajjubandhanaṃ vā gāmabandhanaṃ vā nigamabandhanaṃ
atk-vin02a2:208_7: vā nagarabandhanaṃ vā purisagutti vā janapadabandhanaṃ vā dīpabandhanaṃ vā,
atk-vin02a2:208_8: yo etesu yaṃkiñci bandhanaṃ bhinditvā vā chinditvā vā muñcitvā vā vivaritvā vā passamānānaṃ vā apassamānānaṃ vā palāyati,
atk-vin02a2:208_10: Tasmā īdiso kārabhedako coro dīpabandhanaṃ bhinditvā dīpantaraṃ gatopi na pabbājetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:208_12: kevalaṃ hatthakammaṃ akaronto “evaṃ no apalāyanto karissatī”ti rājayuttādīhi baddho,
atk-vin02a2:208_14: Yo pana gāmanigamapaṭṭanādīni keṇiyā gahetvā taṃ asampādento bandhanāgāraṃ pavesito hoti,
atk-vin02a2:208_16: Yopi kasikammādīhi dhanaṃ sampādetvā jīvanto “nidhānaṃ iminā laddha”nti pesuññaṃ upasaṃharitvā kenaci bandhāpito hoti,
atk-vin02a2:208_18: palāyitvā gataṃ pana gataṭṭhāne pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:209_1: Na bhikkhave likhitakoti ettha likhitako nāma na kevalaṃ “yattha passati tattha hantabbo”ti,
atk-vin02a2:209_2: atha kho yo koci corikaṃ vā aññaṃ vā garuṃ rājāparādhaṃ katvā palāto,
atk-vin02a2:209_3: rājā ca naṃ paṇṇe vā potthake vā “itthannāmo yattha dissati,
atk-vin02a2:209_4: tattha gahetvā māretabbo”ti vā “hatthapādānissa chinditabbānī”ti vā “ettakaṃ nāma daṇḍaṃ āharāpetabbo”ti vā likhāpeti,
atk-vin02a2:210_1: Kasāhato katadaṇḍakammoti ettha yo vacanapesanādīni akaronto haññati,
atk-vin02a2:210_3: Yo pana keṇiyā vā aññathā vā kiñci gahetvā khāditvā puna dātuṃ asakkonto “ayameva te daṇḍo hotū”ti kasāhi haññati,
atk-vin02a2:210_5: So ca kasāhi vā hato hotu addhadaṇḍakādīnaṃ vā aññatarena,
atk-vin02a2:210_9: Sace pana jāṇūhi vā kapparehi vā nāḷikerapāsāṇādīhi vā ghātetvā mutto hoti,
atk-vin02a2:210_12: Phāsukaṃ katvā eva gaṇṭhīsu sannisinnāsu pabbājetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:211_1: Lakkhaṇāhato katadaṇḍakammoti ettha katadaṇḍakammabhāvo purimanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin02a2:211_2: Yassa pana nalāṭe vā ūruādīsu vā tattena lohena lakkhaṇaṃ āhataṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a2:211_3: so sace bhujisso yāva allavaṇo hoti,
atk-vin02a2:211_8: timaṇḍalavatthassa uttarāsaṅge kate paṭicchannokāse ce hoti,
atk-vin02a2:214_1: Na bhikkhave iṇāyikoti ettha iṇāyiko nāma yassa pitipitāmahehi vā iṇaṃ gahitaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a2:214_3: yaṃ vā āthapetvā mātāpitūhi kiñci gahitaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a2:214_4: so taṃ iṇaṃ paresaṃ dhāretīti iṇāyiko.
atk-vin02a2:214_5: Yaṃ pana aññe ñātakā āthapetvā kiñci gaṇhanti,
atk-vin02a2:214_7: Na hi te taṃ āthapetuṃ issarā,
atk-vin02a2:214_11: pabbājetha na”nti iṇaṃ attano bhāraṃ karonti,
atk-vin02a2:214_12: añño vā koci tassa ācārasampattiṃ disvā “pabbājetha naṃ,
atk-vin02a2:214_15: Tesu asati bhikkhunā tathārūpassa upaṭṭhākassāpi ārocetabbaṃ “sahetuko satto iṇapalibodhena na pabbajatī”ti.
atk-vin02a2:214_22: “pabbājetvā bhikkhāya caritvā mocessāmī”ti pabbājetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:215_0: Sace iṇāyiko aññaṃ desaṃ gantvā pucchiyamānopi “nāhaṃ kassaci kiñci dhāremī”ti vatvā pabbajati,
atk-vin02a2:215_1: iṇasāmiko ca taṃ pariyesanto tattha gacchati,
atk-vin02a2:215_3: so ca theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ayaṃ bhante kena pabbājito,
atk-vin02a2:215_4: mama ettakaṃ nāma dhanaṃ gahetvā palāto”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a2:215_5: therena vattabbaṃ “mayā upāsaka ‘aṇaṇo aha’nti vadanto pabbājito,
atk-vin02a2:215_7: passa me pattacīvaramatta”nti ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
atk-vin02a2:216_0: Sace pana naṃ therassa sammukhāva disvā “ayaṃ mama iṇāyiko”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a2:216_3: Sacepi so “pabbajito ayaṃ idāni kuhiṃ gamissatī”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a2:216_6: Sace pana thero “kuhiṃ dāni ayaṃ gamissati,
atk-vin02a2:216_17: Sace pana uddesaparipucchādīsu kusalo hoti bahūpakāro bhikkhūnaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:219_1: Na bhikkhave dāsoti ettha cattāro dāsā – antojāto,
atk-vin02a2:219_5: Tattha antojāto nāma jātidāso gharadāsiyā putto.
atk-vin02a2:219_6: Dhanakkīto nāma mātāpitūnaṃ santikā putto vā sāmikānaṃ santikā dāso vā dhanaṃ datvā dāsacārittaṃ āropetvā kīto.
atk-vin02a2:219_8: Pabbājentena tattha tattha cārittavasena adāsaṃ katvā pabbājetabbā.
atk-vin02a2:220_0: Karamarānīto nāma tiroraṭṭhaṃ vilopaṃ vā katvā upalāpetvā vā tiroraṭṭhato bhujissamānusakāni āharanti,
atk-vin02a2:220_1: antoraṭṭheyeva vā katāparādhaṃ kiñci gāmaṃ rājā “vilumpathā”ti āṇāpeti,
atk-vin02a2:220_6: tesaṃ santike vasanto vā bandhanāgāre baddho vā purisehi rakkhiyamāno vā na pabbājetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:220_9: Raññā tuṭṭhena “karamarānītake muñcathā”ti vatvā vā sabbasādhāraṇena vā nayena bandhanā mokkhe kate pabbājetabbova.
atk-vin02a2:221_0: Sāmaṃ dāsabyaṃ upagato nāma jīvitahetu vā ārakkhahetu vā “ahaṃ te dāso”ti sayameva dāsabhāvaṃ upagato.
atk-vin02a2:221_9: Bhaṭiputtakagaṇādīnaṃ dāsāpi tehi adinnā na pabbājetabbā.
atk-vin02a2:221_10: Vihāresu rājūhi ārāmikadāsā nāma dinnā honti,
atk-vin02a2:221_13: Mahāpaccariyaṃ “antojātadhanakkītake ānetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmike demāti denti,
atk-vin02a2:221_19: Duggatamanussā saṅghaṃ nissāya jīvissāmāti vihāre kappiyakārakā honti,
atk-vin02a2:221_28: Bhikkhussa ñātakā vā upaṭṭhākā vā dāsaṃ denti “imaṃ pabbājetha,
atk-vin02a2:221_29: tumhākaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karissatī”ti attanovāssa dāso atthi,
atk-vin02a2:221_34: amhākaṃ dāsova bhavissatīti ayaṃ tāvakāliko nāma,
atk-vin02a2:221_35: taṃ pabbājetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:221_38: Ajānanto pabbājetvā vā upasampādetvā vā pacchā jānāti,
atk-vin02a2:222_0: Imassa ca atthassa pakāsanatthaṃ idaṃ vatthuṃ vadanti –
atk-vin02a2:222_1: ekā kira kuladāsī ekena saddhiṃ anurādhapurā palāyitvā rohaṇe vasamānā puttaṃ paṭilabhi,
atk-vin02a2:222_2: so pabbajitvā upasampannakāle lajjī kukkuccako ahosi.
atk-vin02a2:222_4: “kiṃ upāsike tumhākaṃ bhātā vā bhaginī vā natthi,
atk-vin02a2:222_7: tava pitarā saddhiṃ palāyitvā idha vasāmī”ti.
atk-vin02a2:222_8: Sīlavā bhikkhu “asuddhā kira me pabbajjā”ti saṃvegaṃ labhitvā mātaraṃ tassa kulassa nāmagottaṃ pucchitvā
atk-vin02a2:222_9: anurādhapuraṃ āgamma tassa kulassa gharadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin02a2:222_18: Te haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “suddhā bhante tumhākaṃ pabbajjā”ti taṃ bhujissaṃ katvā mahāvihāre vasāpesuṃ catūhi paccayehi paṭijaggantā.
atk-vin02a2:222_19: Thero taṃ kulaṃ nissāya vasamānoyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-vin02a2:225_3: Saṅghaṃ apaloketuṃ bhaṇḍukammāyāti saṅghaṃ bhaṇḍukammatthāya āpucchituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin02a2:225_5: sīmāpariyāpanne bhikkhū sannipātetvā pabbajjāpekkhaṃ tattha netvā “saṅghaṃ bhante imassa dārakassa bhaṇḍukammaṃ
atk-vin02a2:225_6: āpucchāmī”ti tikkhattuṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā sakiṃ vā vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:225_7: Ettha ca “imassa dārakassa bhaṇḍukammaṃ āpucchāmī”tipi “imassa samaṇakaraṇaṃ āpucchāmī”tipi “imassa pabbājanaṃ
atk-vin02a2:225_8: āpucchāmī”tipi “ayaṃ samaṇo hotukāmo”tipi “ayaṃ pabbajitukāmo”tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin02a2:226_1: dasa vā vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ vā bhikkhū vasantīti paricchedo paññāyati,
atk-vin02a2:226_2: tesaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ vā nisinnokāsaṃ vā gantvāpi purimanayeneva āpucchitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:226_3: Pabbajjāpekkhaṃ vināva daharabhikkhū vā sāmaṇere vā pesetvāpi “eko bhante pabbajjāpekkho atthi tassa
atk-vin02a2:227_0: Sace keci bhikkhū senāsanaṃ vā gumbādīni vā pavisitvā niddāyanti vā samaṇadhammaṃ vā karonti,
atk-vin02a2:227_1: āpucchakā ca pariyesantāpi adisvā “sabbe āpucchitā amhehī”ti saññino honti,
atk-vin02a2:228_3: khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ vā ṭhatvā nadīsamuddādīni vā gantvā pabbājetabbo.
atk-vin02a2:228_4: Yo pana navamuṇḍo vā hoti vibbhantako vā nigaṇṭhādīsu aññataro vā dvaṅgulakeso vā ūnadvaṅgulakeso vā,
atk-vin02a2:228_6: tasmā bhaṇḍukammaṃ anāpucchitvāpi tādisaṃ pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a2:228_7: Dvaṅgulātirittakeso pana yo hoti antamaso ekasikhāmattadharopi,
atk-vin02a2:229_4: yo bhittiṃ vā chadanaṃ vā bhinditvā palāyati,
atk-vin02a2:230_0: Kākuḍḍepakanti yo vāmahatthena leḍḍuṃ gahetvā nisinno sakkoti āgatāgate kāke uḍḍāpetvā purato nikkhittaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjituṃ,
atk-vin02a2:231_0: 102. Ittaroti appamattako; katipāhameva vāso bhavissatīti attho.
atk-vin02a2:232_3: Abyattena yāvajīvanti ettha sacāyaṃ vuḍḍhataraṃ ācariyaṃ na labhati,
atk-vin02a2:232_4: upasampadāya saṭṭhivasso vā sattativasso vā hotu,
atk-vin02a2:232_5: navakatarassāpi byattassa santike ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ācariyo me āvuso hohi,
atk-vin02a2:232_6: āyasmato nissāya vacchāmī”ti evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vatvā nissayo gahetabbova.
atk-vin02a2:232_7: Gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchantenāpi ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchāmi ācariyā”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:232_9: Pañcakachakkesu cettha yattakaṃ sutaṃ nissayamuttakassa icchitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:235_1: Yena kapilavatthu tena cārikaṃ pakkāmīti ettha ayaṃ anupubbikathā.
atk-vin02a2:235_2: Suddhodanamahārājā kira bodhisattassa abhinikkhamanadivasato paṭṭhāya “mama putto buddho bhavissāmīti nikkhanto,
atk-vin02a2:235_3: jāto nu kho buddho”ti pavattisavanatthaṃ ohitasotova viharati.
atk-vin02a2:235_4: So bhagavato padhānacariyañca sambodhiñca dhammacakkappavattanādīni ca suṇanto “idāni kira me putto rājagahaṃ
atk-vin02a2:235_5: upanissāya viharatī”ti sutvā ekaṃ amaccaṃ āṇāpesi –
atk-vin02a2:235_8: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā purisasahassaparivāro rājagahaṃ gantvā bhagavato pāde vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-vin02a2:235_12: so sapariso arahattaṃ patvā tattheva phalasamāpattisukhaṃ anubhavamāno vihāsi.
atk-vin02a2:235_13: Rājā teneva upāyena aparepi aṭṭha dūte pahiṇi,
atk-vin02a2:235_14: tepi sabbe saparisā tatheva arahattaṃ patvā tattheva vihariṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:235_15: “Iminā nāma kāraṇena te nāgacchantī”ti rañño koci pavattimattampi ārocento natthi.
atk-vin02a2:236_0: Atha rājā bodhisattena saddhiṃ ekadivasaṃjātaṃ kāḷudāyiṃ nāma amaccaṃ pahiṇitukāmo purimanayeneva yāci,
atk-vin02a2:236_3: Taṃ rājā “pabbajitvāpi me puttaṃ dassehī”ti pahiṇi;
atk-vin02a2:236_4: sopi purisasahassaparivāro gantvā tatheva saparivāro arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-vin02a2:236_5: So ekadivasaṃ sambhatesu sabbasassesu vissaṭṭhakammantesu janapadamanussesu pupphitesu thalajajalajapupphesu
atk-vin02a2:236_6: paṭipajjanakkhame magge bhagavantaṃ vanditvā saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi gamanavaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇesi.
atk-vin02a2:236_9: jīvantasseva me puttaṃ dassehī”ti maṃ pesesi,
atk-vin02a2:236_10: sādhu bhante bhagavā ñātakānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karotu,
atk-vin02a2:236_15: Bhagavā aṅgamagadhavāsīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ dasahi sahassehi kapilavatthuvāsīnaṃ dasahīti sabbeheva vīsatisahassehi
atk-vin02a2:236_16: khīṇāsavehi parivuto rājagahā nikkhamitvā rājagahato saṭṭhiyojanikaṃ kapilavatthuṃ divase divase yojanaṃ
atk-vin02a2:236_17: gacchanto dvīhi māsehi pāpuṇissāmīti aturitacārikaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-vin02a2:237_0: Evaṃ pakkante ca bhagavati udāyitthero nikkhantadivasato paṭṭhāya suddhodanamahārājassa gehe bhattakiccaṃ karoti.
atk-vin02a2:237_1: Rājā theraṃ parivisitvā pattaṃ gandhacuṇṇena ubbaṭṭetvā uttamabhojanassa pūretvā “bhagavato dehī”ti therassa hatthe ṭhapeti.
atk-vin02a2:237_3: Iti bhagavā antarāmagge raññoyeva piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñji.
atk-vin02a2:237_4: Theropi ca bhattakiccāvasāne divase divase rañño āroceti “ajja bhagavā ettakaṃ āgato”ti,
atk-vin02a2:237_5: buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttāya ca kathāya sākiyānaṃ bhagavati saddhaṃ uppādesi.
atk-vin02a2:237_8: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kulappasādakānaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷudāyī”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-vin02a2:238_0: Sākiyāpi kho anuppatte bhagavati “amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhaṃ passissāmā”ti sannipatitvā bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a2:238_1: vīmaṃsamānā nigrodhasakkassa ārāmo ramaṇīyoti sallakkhetvā tattha sabbaṃ paṭijagganavidhiṃ kāretvā gandhapupphādihatthā
atk-vin02a2:238_2: paccuggamanaṃ karontā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍite daharadahare nāgarikadārake ca dārikāyo ca paṭhamaṃ pahiṇiṃsu,
atk-vin02a2:238_3: tato rājakumāre ca rājakumārikāyo ca tesaṃ anantarā sāmaṃ gantvā gandhapupphacuṇṇādīhi pūjayamānā bhagavantaṃ gahetvā nigrodhārāmameva agamaṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:239_0: Tesu evaṃ nisinnesu bhagavā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā “na maṃ ñātī vandanti,
atk-vin02a2:239_1: handa ne vandāpayissāmī”ti abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya iddhiyā ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-vin02a2:239_2: tesaṃ sīse pādapaṃsuṃ okiramāno viya kaṇḍambamūle yamakapāṭihāriyasadisaṃ pāṭihāriyamakāsi.
atk-vin02a2:239_4: “bhagavā tumhākaṃ maṅgaladivase brāhmaṇassa vandanatthaṃ upanītānaṃ pāde vo parivattitvā brāhmaṇassa matthake patiṭṭhite disvāpi ahaṃ tumhe vandiṃ,
atk-vin02a2:239_6: Vappamaṅgaladivase jambucchāyāya sirisayane nipannānaṃ vo jambucchāyāya aparivattanaṃ disvāpi pāde vandiṃ,
atk-vin02a2:239_8: Idāni imaṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvāpi tumhākaṃ pāde vandāmi,
atk-vin02a2:240_0: Suddhodanamahārājena pana vandite bhagavati avanditvā ṭhito nāma ekasākiyopi nāhosi,
atk-vin02a2:240_2: Iti bhagavā ñātayo vandāpetvā ākāsato oruyha paññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-vin02a2:240_9: Bhagavā “na idāneva mayhaṃ ñātisamāgame pokkharavassaṃ vassati,
atk-vin02a2:240_10: atītepi vassī”ti imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā vessantarajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-vin02a2:240_11: Dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sabbe uṭṭhāya vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:240_12: Ekopi rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā “sve amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā gato nāma natthi.
atk-vin02a2:241_0: Bhagavā dutiyadivase vīsatibhikkhusahassaparivāro kapilavatthuṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi,
atk-vin02a2:241_1: na koci paccuggantvā nimantesi vā pattaṃ vā aggahesi.
atk-vin02a2:241_3: “kathaṃ nu kho pubbe buddhā kulanagare piṇḍāya cariṃsu,
atk-vin02a2:241_6: Tato ekabuddhassapi uppaṭipāṭiyā gamanaṃ adisvā “mayāpi idāni ayameva vaṃso ayaṃ paveṇī paggahetabbā,
atk-vin02a2:241_7: āyatiñca me sāvakāpi mameva anusikkhantā piṇḍacāriyavattaṃ pūressantī”ti koṭiyaṃ niviṭṭhagehato paṭṭhāya sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya carati.
atk-vin02a2:241_8: “Ayyo kira siddhatthakumāro piṇḍāya caratī”ti catubhūmakādīsu pāsādesu sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā mahājano dassanabyāvaṭo ahosi.
atk-vin02a2:241_9: Rāhulamātāpi devī “ayyaputto kira imasmiṃyeva nagare mahatā rājānubhāvena suvaṇṇasivikādīhi vicaritvā
atk-vin02a2:241_10: idāni kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyavatthavasano kapālahattho piṇḍāya carati,
atk-vin02a2:241_11: “sobhati nu kho no vā”ti sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā olokayamānā bhagavantaṃ nānāvirāgasamujjalāya sarīrappabhāya
atk-vin02a2:241_12: nagaravīthiyo obhāsetvā buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ disvā uṇhīsato paṭṭhāya yāva pādatalā narasīhagāthāhi
atk-vin02a2:241_13: nāma aṭṭhahi gāthāhi abhitthavitvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “tumhākaṃ putto piṇḍāya caratī”ti rañño ārocesi.
atk-vin02a2:241_14: Rājā saṃviggahadayo hatthena sāṭakaṃ saṇṭhāpayamāno turitaturitaṃ nikkhamitvā vegena gantvā bhagavato purato ṭhatvā āha –
atk-vin02a2:241_17: kiṃ ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ na sakkā bhattaṃ laddhunti evaṃsaññino ahuvatthā”ti.
atk-vin02a2:241_19: Nanu bhante amhākaṃ mahāsammatakhattiyavaṃso nāma vaṃso,
atk-vin02a2:241_20: tattha ca ekakhattiyopi bhikkhācāro nāma natthīti.
atk-vin02a2:241_21: Ayaṃ mahārāja vaṃso nāma tava vaṃso,
atk-vin02a2:241_23: sabbabuddhā ca piṇḍacārikā ahesunti antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitova –
atk-vin02a2:243_0: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi cā”ti.
atk-vin02a2:244_0: Imaṃ gāthamāha. Gāthāpariyosāne rājā sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-vin02a2:245_0: “Dhammaṃ care sucaritaṃ, na naṃ duccaritaṃ care;
atk-vin02a2:246_0: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi cā”ti.
atk-vin02a2:247_0: Imaṃ pana gāthaṃ sutvā sakadāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-vin02a2:247_2: maraṇasamaye setacchattassa heṭṭhā sirisayane nipannoyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-vin02a2:248_0: Sotāpattiphalañca sacchikatvā eva pana bhagavato pattaṃ gahetvā saparisaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahāpāsādaṃ āropetvā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisi.
atk-vin02a2:248_1: Bhattakiccāvasāne sabbaṃ itthāgāraṃ āgantvā bhagavantaṃ vandi ṭhapetvā rāhulamātaraṃ.
atk-vin02a2:248_2: Sā pana “gaccha ayyaputtaṃ vandāhī”ti parijanena vuccamānāpi “sace mayhaṃ guṇo atthi,
atk-vin02a2:248_4: āgataṃ naṃ vandissāmī”ti vatvā na agamāsi.
atk-vin02a2:248_5: Atha bhagavā rājānaṃ pattaṃ gāhāpetvā dvīhi aggasāvakehi saddhiṃ rājadhītāya sirigabbhaṃ gantvā “rājadhītā
atk-vin02a2:248_6: yathāruciyā vandamānā na kiñci vattabbā”ti vatvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-vin02a2:248_7: Sā vegena āgantvā gopphakesu gahetvā pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ sīsaṃ parivattetvā parivattetvā yathājjhāsayaṃ vandi.
atk-vin02a2:249_1: Bhagavā “anacchariyaṃ mahārāja yaṃ idāni paripakke ñāṇe tayā rakkhiyamānā rājadhītā attānaṃ rakkhi,
atk-vin02a2:249_2: sā pubbe anārakkhā pabbatapāde vicaramānā aparipakke ñāṇe attānaṃ rakkhī”ti vatvā candakinnarījātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-vin02a2:250_0: Taṃdivasameva ca nandarājakumārassa kesavissajjanaṃ paṭṭabandho gharamaṅgalaṃ āvāhamaṅgalaṃ chattamaṅgalanti pañca mahāmaṅgalāni honti.
atk-vin02a2:250_1: Bhagavā nandaṃ pattaṃ gāhāpetvā maṅgalaṃ vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-vin02a2:250_2: Janapadakalyāṇī kumāraṃ gacchantaṃ disvā “tuvaṭaṃ kho ayyaputta āgaccheyyāsī”ti vatvā gīvaṃ pasāretvā olokesi.
atk-vin02a2:250_3: Sopi bhagavantaṃ “pattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ avisahamāno vihāraṃyeva agamāsi.
atk-vin02a2:250_5: Iti bhagavā kapilapuraṃ āgantvā dutiyadivase nandaṃ pabbājesi.
atk-vin02a2:251_0: Sattame divase rāhulamātā kumāraṃ alaṅkaritvā bhagavato santikaṃ pesesi –
atk-vin02a2:251_1: “passa tāta etaṃ vīsatisahassasamaṇaparivutaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ brahmarūpavaṇṇaṃ samaṇaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:251_6: ahaṃ tāta kumāro chattaṃ ussāpetvā cakkavattī bhavissāmi,
atk-vin02a2:251_10: Rāhulakumāro bhagavato santikaṃ gantvāva pitusinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā haṭṭhacitto “sukhā te samaṇa chāyā”ti
atk-vin02a2:251_11: vatvā aññampi bahuṃ attano anurūpaṃ vadanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin02a2:251_12: Bhagavā katabhattakicco anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-vin02a2:251_14: dāyajjaṃ me samaṇa dehī”ti bhagavantaṃ anubandhi.
atk-vin02a2:252_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesīti bhagavā kumāraṃ na nivattāpesi,
atk-vin02a2:252_1: parijanopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ gacchantaṃ nivattetuṃ na visahati.
atk-vin02a2:252_2: Atha ārāmaṃ gantvā “yaṃ ayaṃ pitusantakaṃ dhanaṃ icchati,
atk-vin02a2:252_4: handassa bodhimaṇḍe paṭiladdhaṃ sattavidhaṃ ariyadhanaṃ demi,
atk-vin02a2:252_5: lokuttaradāyajjassa naṃ sāmikaṃ karomī”ti āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi.
atk-vin02a2:253_0: Idāni yā sā bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca anuññātā,
atk-vin02a2:253_1: tato yasmā upasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā garubhāve ṭhapetvā ñatticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā,
atk-vin02a2:253_6: kiṃ nu kho idānipi upasampadā viya kammavācāya eva kattabbā,
atk-vin02a2:253_8: Imañca panatthaṃ viditvā bhagavā puna tīhi saraṇagamanehi sāmaṇerapabbajjaṃ anujānitukāmo,
atk-vin02a2:253_9: tasmā dhammasenāpati taṃ bhagavato ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā bhagavantaṃ puna pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetukāmo āha –
atk-vin02a2:254_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto rāhulakumāraṃ pabbājesīti kumārassa mahāmoggallānatthero kese chinditvā kāsāyāni datvā saraṇāni adāsi.
atk-vin02a2:254_2: Yasmā pana upajjhāyamūlakā pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca,
atk-vin02a2:255_0: Evaṃ “kumāro pabbajito”ti sutvā uppannasaṃvegena hadayena atha kho suddhodano sakkoti sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a2:255_1: Tattha yasmā uñchācariyāya jīvato pabbajitassa avisesena “varaṃ yācāmī”ti vutte “yācassū”ti vacanaṃ appatirūpaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:255_4: Yañca bhante kappati yañca anavajjanti yaṃ tumhākañceva dātuṃ kappati,
atk-vin02a2:255_6: mama ca sampaṭicchanapaccayā viññūhi na garahitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a2:255_8: Tathā nande adhimattaṃ rāhuleti yatheva kira bodhisattaṃ evaṃ nandampi rāhulampi maṅgaladivase nemittakā “cakkavattī bhavissatī”ti byākariṃsu.
atk-vin02a2:255_9: Atha rājā “puttassa cakkavattisiriṃ passissāmī”ti ussāhajāto bhagavato pabbajjāya mahantaṃ icchāvighātaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-vin02a2:255_12: Iti tampi dukkhaṃ adhivāsetvā “idāni rāhulassa cakkavattisiriṃ passissāmī”ti ussāhaṃ janesi,
atk-vin02a2:255_18: Rañño pana ito pacchā anāgāmiphalappatti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a2:256_0: Sādhu bhante ayyāti idaṃ kasmā āha?
atk-vin02a2:256_2: “yatra hi nāma ahampi buddhamāmako dhammamāmako saṅghamāmako samāno attano piyataraputte pabbājiyamāne ñātiviyogadukkhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-vin02a2:256_3: aññe janā puttanattakesu pabbājitesu kathaṃ adhivāsessanti,
